I love being able to take my favorite book(s) with me when I am on the go, and I have the ability to stop at a Wi-Fi hotspot and plugging into the Internet in order to read the latest news, get the weather, run an application, etc.But, I really like the fact that I can take the lightweight iPad 64GB Wi-Fi/3G with me everywhere and still gain access to my pre-selected books, magazines, music and images, not to mention a seemingly endless supply of useful applications.  And let's not forget the Internet and business e-mail.Today while was waiting in line (yes I said line) for my dealership to open up so I could get me car serviced, I brook out my iPad 2 and started watch videos on Vevo; now how cool is that?Setting up Wi-Fi is easy enough; the antenna is always on and looking for new connection.  I set up the iPad 2 64GB Wi-Fi/3G to use the secure wireless setup at work; I typed in the pass-phrase via the incredibly handy keyboard and surfed the Internet; simple and easy.  Since I bought the iPad 2 64GB Wi-Fi/3G I have taken it out frequently to places that offer free Wi-Fi access and in only one instance did I have an issue connecting.  Nice!  And even then I effortlessly switched to 3G and, instance access.ConclusionsLike the iPad 1 before it the iPad 2 is the must have device of the decade, period!  Not a day goes by when I do not use it for something.  I love the portability of the device, the ease of use, the utilitarian nature of the unit, thanks in large part to the plethora of Apps that can be down loaded and utilized for the tablet.Is the iPad 2 64GB Wi-Fi/3G ready for the enterprise?  I say yes with a few caveats; chief among them is the inability of the tablet to truly manipulate Microsoft Office Applications without the assistance of the Documents-to-Go application ($9.99).  Second is the inability to truly mirror the iPad screen on a monitor, however with the Apple Digital AV Adapter that can be changed.  Video can be presented onto the screen--via an HDMI connection.  Lastly, is the lack of available USB port(s) or a memory card reader that will accept memory devices and help you keep files organized on-the-go, as well as the ability to truly turn the iPad into a mobile office.  As it stands now any document you want to work with must be e-mailed and then opened.  However, the iPad was never marketed as a laptop, or laptop replacement, so...Not that these problems cannot be overcome, but they are limitation that a laptop and even netbooks do not suffer from.  However, hands down, the Apple iPad 2 64GB Wi-Fi/3G is a performance winner, and one heck of an e-book reader! Yes, the entrance fee (799.00) is steep, and enterprise customers will have to think long and hard at the cost, however the iPad now has a certain "cool" factor that is hard to escape.  The more large enterprises adapt the iPad and find practical uses for it, the more popular it will become in the hall of corporate America.So far the iPad 2 64GB Wi-Fi/3G has more than lived up to my expectations and I have fun testing the limits of its ability to operate effectively in the enterprise and personal environments.

Reviews.Title: A Late Review (but a different one)
Reviews.Author: Londonnoise "Robby"
Reviews.Content: This things been reviewed to death, so I won't talk about specs, capabilities, etc., but I wanted to tell a quick story of why I'll be using these things for as long as Apple make them. I got this when it first came out. I'm IT savvy(ish), and knew how to set the thing up. At the same time, I gave my Windows Netbook to my lovely mother :-)  It was her first time with a computer and it didn't go well. Now don't get me wrong, I love Windows and use it every day, but it's hard explaining to a 75 year old why you need security updates and a reboot, or why something is stuck in the Outbox, or many other occurrences.Ultimately, I decided to upgrade to a newer iPad (go iPad Air!), and I took the Netbook from her, and gave her this instead. Sure, I set up a few things like email, etc. and had to tell her that "Safari is now your Internet Explorer", but then she was off!The point is that these things are just so intuitive, that almost anyone can just work them out. For anyone thinking of getting someone older (or maybe even younger), into using the Net, etc., I can't recommend this enough.

Being a college student, I use Pages, voice recorder, and goodnotes the most, which, by themselves, are amazing applications that help me get through classes with little stress. Reviews.Title: But it's an Apple...
Reviews.Author: Dr. H. Paul Shuch "drseti"
Reviews.Content: OK, so I'm not exactly thrilled with the Apple hardware philosophy. You can't swap the battery, there's no way to expand the memory (it doesn't have a CF slot or accept a USB stick), and there's no resident filing system included in the OS. Still, the iPad has become the industry standard in aviation, the only platform approved by the FAA as an electronic flight bag.  And, replacing 30 pounds of paper charts (which have to be updated every 56 days) with a 1 1/2 pound tablet saves money, trees, and fuel. So, it's a no-brainer.  (I still wish I could swap batteries and plug in memory.)

Reviews.Title: A Tablet Like The iPad 2 Should Be A Fixture In Every Household!
Reviews.Author: The Incarcerator
Reviews.Content: I purchased the white iPad 2 + WiFi/3G from my local Apple Store in March of 2011 upon it's release.  At the time, I really felt like I was "biting the bullet."  I guess I just didn't think I would totally harness it's capabilities and only use it "casually" to write the occasional e-mail and surf the web.  To that end, I was right but as far as iPad generations are concerned, this device hits the sweet spot for what I use the tablet for (surfing the web, typing posts on Amazon, Tweeting and the occasional e-mail).  It's not too powerful for gaming per se but offers a silky smooth performance for business related functionality.  I even find that I don't need a BlueTooth keyboard as typing on it's screen in landscape mode is fast and easy enough.The only disappointment I have is that I paid for the cellular antenna.  I find that I mostly use this device in the home as a quick means of accessing the Internet where a WiFi access point is readily available.  I also take it with me out-of-town and for the most part, most hotels offer free WiFi so the cellular aspect of this device was money wasted.I am EXTREMELY pleased with this device's battery life.  It has been tested and found that the iPad 2 has the longest battery life of ALL the iPad generations up through the iPad 4 or "iPad with Retina Display!"  I truly believe this iPad second generation is the "sweet spot" in Apple's iPad lineup and that is why the Cupertino company is continuing to offer this device for purchase.  You don't really need the "retina" screen or the extra 500mb of memory for business tasks such as surfing the web or writing an e-mail.  This device will work flawlessly for those tasks.I can only express how happy I am that I purchased this tablet.  I will probably upgrade to the next iPad 5th generation, if it offers the robust WiFi AC and comes in an even slimmer, more elegant form factor.  I would recommend that users opt out of getting the cellular model unless they need to use the device in their cars for example.  I have a Garmin GPS, so this is a non issue.

Reviews.Title: A Happy Granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Greg B.
Reviews.Content: I had given my son and daughter-in-law and iPad for Christmas.  What none of us counted on was how much my 4 year old granddaughter loved spending time on it.  So, I decided to "spoil" her a little and bought this one for her.  She absolutely loves it, and since she is also home schooled, this is a tremendous asset.  The only drawback is that my son and daughter in law have to limit the amount of time she spends on it...she is like a sponge when it comes to learning!  I just wish these were around when I was her age!

We chose RockerJakes because of the detailed description of the unit and prompt reply when we inquired directly to the company before making the purchase.  The unit was described as having 3 scratches which upon arrival were very minimal and acceptable - especially after putting it in a case.  Seems brand new actually!  The unit came with a protective screen so we put that on right away before the children used the device.  Within minutes we were up and running the iPad 2 full force testing it out.  It works great and seems just as great as the iPads we have purchased brand new.We did have some hiccups with shipping.  Didn't realize a signature was required to receive the package.  After wrestling with Amazon and UPS, we worked something out and Amazon was very customer focused and willing to help make things right.  Thank you!!

Reviews.Title: 1st experience with Apple
Reviews.Author: Dar T "Montana Gal"
Reviews.Content: I have always owned Windows operating PC's so this IPad 2 is a whole new experience for me.  I am venturing along with it & am now fairly comfortable with using it for basics.  I purchased it because it was available with Verizon  which I think will be a great way for me to use a computer when I travel without the need to seek a hotspot, somewhere.  I doubt that I will use it or any computer to run my life with but browsing, e mail & reading books on it is great.I bought the IPad 2 rather than the newer model as my needs do not justify the additional cost just to have the latest model.

Reviews.Title: All good!
Reviews.Author: ajackson
Reviews.Content: IPad in the shape it was described.  We have had NO problems with it at all!  It was a b-day gift for my son and he hasn't stopped playing it.  No noticeable scratches or dents.  All extras came as described.  We really like the case and skin that it came with.

Reviews.Title: Not Good
Reviews.Author: Michael Noto
Reviews.Content: Did not work, it was an item that was returned and then resold. Apple did replace it for the original iPad so we ware out some money.

Reviews.Title: really great product
Reviews.Author: Brian Landis
Reviews.Content: ordered the ipad 2 for my son for christmas and he was very happy with it, hes on it almost everyday

Reviews.Title: Fine For Me!
Reviews.Author: PaganDeva2000 "pagandeva2000"
Reviews.Content: In November, I purchased the iPad Mini, which, was my first iPad.  I was thrilled to death to have it, and after a few months, I knew that I wanted a larger screen and more GB, so, I spent time trying to find out whether or not I wanted to spend for the iPad 4.  After some thought, I decided to get an iPad 2, since the mini and this one were built the same.  I am not disappointed.  As soon as I added the upgrade, I was able to use Siri, even on the iPad 2.  I personally can't tell the difference between Retina display or not, so, I am pleased with this purchase.  You can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 - great purchase.
Reviews.Author: J Wilde
Reviews.Content: We use for company purchase and like it!  like it, like it, like it, like it, like it, like it.

Reviews.Title: Splurge Well Worth it
Reviews.Author: Jordan J
Reviews.Content: When I bought my iPad, it was a complete splurge. I was at the apple store to fix a operator-error with my iphone and asked about the iPad. I originally thought that it was just an overgrown iPod touch, but the more I learned about it, the more I realized that it seemed to be a small computer. The iPad has Bluetooth capabilities and I bought a Bluetooth keyboard to go with the iPad. I am still wrapping my head around the iPad and all its features. I really enjoy the iCloud, allowing me to sync up my iPhone and iPad. One of the first apps I downloaded was Pages and it has been fantastic. One of my biggest concerns regarding the iPad is the accessibility to remove documents, pictures,etc off of the iPad. There is no USB port, so I cannot hook up a zip-drive and due to the age of my Mac, I cannot download the iCloud app. So my only options are to email it to myself or go on my computer, go to the iCloud website, sign-on and get the document that way. When I brought this up to the Apple worker, he stated that the iPad is capable of printing directly from the iPad as an option as well. So that minimized my concerns. Over all, I am very happy with the decision I made, all my questions regarding the iPad have been able to be answered with a simple google-search. One of the best spur-of-the-moment purchases I have ever made.

Reviews.Title: My Pad
Reviews.Author: R. Childers "Hobbes"
Reviews.Content: I can't find anything wrong with Ipad2.  I don't even know why anyone would want Ipad 3 or 4.  If your eyes aren't what they once were then don't make the mistake of getting a smaller tablet.  This one is perfect.  Not heavy.  Not thick. Best Apps you can find.  I hardly ever use a computer anymore.  Now idiots writing virus programs for Windows operating systems doesn't matter.  My Kindle Fire books load into this via a terrific App and I can read them with comfort.  I can watch movies on it although I rarely do since TV technology lets me do that on a 55 inch screen.  But you "can" send video from the Ipad via an "air video" capability and view it on the big TV.  World Camera Apps let you see the world live on mounted video cameras.  Watch it snow up north while basking in 70 degree warmth in the south.  Cool.  Push a button and see the total of all your investments and bank accounts.  any time.  That's the MINT App.  Just save up and get the thing.  Great technology.  Gotta love it.  I use it every day.

Reviews.Title: Love this iPad!
Reviews.Author: Angela K. Sams
Reviews.Content: I use this iPad for work every day. I am very happy with it. I also got the keyboard folio so it is jus like a laptop. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great IPad
Reviews.Author: johnny
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with the IPad it's in perfect condition. I could not be anymore pleased. Thanks so much for a great deal

Reviews.Title: Take Your Pick: Leisure or Work (It Works for All!!)
Reviews.Author: oberbe01
Reviews.Content: My primary reason for acquiring an iPad was for leisure and for work in the future.  I am currently a college student with plans to teach at the high school level, so I knew there would be endless amount of apps that will enhance my teaching in the future.  Right now, schools are exploring 1 on 1 iPads with their students because it makes it so much easier to grade and create assignments without the hassle of textbooks.  At home, I became sick of pulling out my four-year old Dell laptop to surf the web, watch videos, and just play around.  I wanted something that was smaller, easy to travel with, and it had to be a tablet.  Now, my Dell is fine for writing papers and all the other obligations that come with being a college student, but for an apple product as efficient and productive as the iPad, the price is tough to beat.  The iPad does not replace a desktop or a laptop, but it is a tremendous technological device that is user friendly and fun to play with.  Whether it is for leisure or work, there is an application for it.  What I like the most is that the ios apple system signals to the iPad when it is time for an update, making it up to par with the latest technology, which in turn betters its efficiency and productivity instantly.  With that being said, the ability to access the apple store is what sets it apart from other tablets.  Like I previously stated, there are apps for everything, and there are even several free apps that increase enjoyment and productivity.  It is a must buy for anyone interested in a tablet for both leisure and work obligations.I also have an iPhone 4 which I use very religiously, and the iPad 2 is an extension of that for me.  There are fewer apps available for the iPad, but that's not saying a lot, as there are still thousands available for it, as I find myself searching for a new app daily on the apple store.I have the 32GB edition and have not come close to filling up all the storage space!  I think it is the perfect size for somebody that doesn't constantly use it, but for someone that is on it daily at work or at home.  If you are going to count on it for everything you do in regards to a computer device, I would recommend the 64GB, but for me the 32GB has been great and I have not run into any problems to this point.  In addition, the device is very light, and you can hold it with one hand.  Definitely buy a protective case for your iPad, even though I have found it to be very durable.It is very nice to be able to use it like a mini computer.  You can access your personal files via google drive, drop box, etc. to increase productivity and bring your desktop or laptop files on the road with you.  One nice feature is that you can view websites with a mobile display or desktop display, serving for the benefit of all users.  Powerpoints, Word Documents, and PDF's are easy to view with the tap of the finger, which is very beneficial for someone in the business world or still in school.While I thoroughly enjoy my iPad 2, there are frustrations with it.  I find myself frustrated with the fact that I can't play Flash.  I like to watch videos, especially via twitter and facebook, and a lot of times I am unable to do so because of the software's inability to play flash.  In addition, I get frustrated because I wish I could make the iPad my only source of a computer.  I wish I could type on word and make a powerpoint as seamless as I do on my Dell.  I could do that, but on a college budget you don't want to be paying for an expensive app to make that a reality, but that's also the beauty of it.  You could download Microsoft Office products if you wanted to make it your go-to computer device.  One thing I would suggest is buying a keyboard for your iPad.  I went a year without one, but once I acquired a keyboard it made it that much more efficient to use!  So much easier to surf the web, iMessage, etc.In essence, if you're having a tough time deciding on buying an iPad or not, I would highly suggest buying one.  Now, if it is between a MAC laptop and an iPad, go with the laptop.  But, if you are in the market for a tablet and are looking for efficiency and productivity with a tablet, the iPad is a much because of the apple IOS software and the thousands of applications available via the apple store.  The slick design with endless amount of possibilities to increase production with an iPad puts it a head above the rest.  Once you begin using an iPad, you won't regret the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Wonderfully limited
Reviews.Author: D. Adams
Reviews.Content: I swore up and down I'd NEVER purchase an apple product, including things on itunes and the like.  So far, I have upheld that promise.  However, from a recent car purchase, I managed to obtain an iPad 2 16GB as a promotion.  Since my girlfriend had one and I did want some experience with iOS, I figured I'd begin poking around with it rather than simply selling it.The good...iOS is very easy to use and extremely straight forward.  Everything is laid out nicely and always a flick-tap away.  And most all programs work very well with the unit.  Software tends to be clean without too many bugs.Web browsing (just using Safari) is very smooth.  Most sites work well.  There's the ocational hiccup but it's more from using a touchscreen or the dreaded lack of Flash.  But soon enough, sites will probably migrate away from flash and on towards HTML5 (or simply pages designed for mobile/iPads).Usability, such as typing is very straight forward.  The keyboard is well thought out and works much better than any I've used.  The touchscreen is very responsive too and multi-touch works without a problem.Standby time is awesome and the unit is still functioning (IE gives you push notifications of Skype/AIM/etc)Given the standpoint of say someone's who's very unfamiliar with technology or who doesn't care to spend time "configuring things", this works great.  However, that is not who I am...The bad...You are extremely limited.  Being closed source, some apps simply are not available as they would be for Android or Windows-based tablets (and I mean x86, not Windows 8 RT)  Finding ways to print can be impossible, certain formats may be unreadable, and even simple things such as adding attachments in gmail may be hindered without installing additional apps.No Flash support!!!  As mentioned above, things are moving away from flash.  However, many sites still use flash there for some sites will not display correctly.  You are also limited on sites like Youtube, sometimes being unable to open the same videos you can open on a desktop environment (or even Android devices).Where are my files?!  Stuff just downloads.  You have no choice where to put them.  Download something you don't want to share then start browsing the photos you took using the camera, SURPRISE!Limited connectivity.  Expansion is limited to the propriatary apple plug on the bottom.  No OTG port, no standard USB, no microSD slot, no HDMI.  You can purchase some overpriced devices to give you these functions, but it would be nice to see some of them included.---All in all, it depends on the person whether or not one of these would fit your bill.  My girlfriend loves hers and almost never uses her PCs anymore.  For me, I'll grab mine for basic web surfing and the like, but if I'm doing much typing or any surfing that requires a fair bit of clicking, I still will grab a laptop over this.

Reviews.Title: Fun to use in many ways.  I especially like to take pictures.
Reviews.Author: Del McGowen
Reviews.Content: With the help of my grandson I have mastered use of the Apple iPaD 2..Perhaps more detailed instructions for use of the iPad would help senior adults.

When i pad arrived i was so happy,but onece i turned it on and played a song, the sound was terrible,wierd noise mixed with a song made it unexeptable for the ears! I was very upset.Scheduled a return, and it was handled very fast and smooth, atleast this part was good:))))

Reviews.Title: still no i pad
Reviews.Author: Irene
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed when my grandaughter opened this christmas gift, and it was damaged. We could not tell it was damaged,until she opened it. Of course she could not play it.I returned it on Dec. 28, 2012, and was told they would send a replacement. I have tracking records that say they received it on Jan. 3, and signed for it.Now I got an email this morning, saying they do not have the unit.I have ordered a LOT of items from Amazon, and this is the very first problem I have had. The problem is with ANGEL SELLERS, who sent out the damaged I PAD.The product was bent on the side, and it could not be used . What a letdownfor our grandaughter, she was so happy when she opened it, then found out we had to return it. Never thought it would take this long to get resolved.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful

Reviews.Content: Product works perfectly, I have no complain, it pick wifi quickly and updates itself every month, in fact I'm using it now to write this review.

Reviews.Title: Terrible

Reviews.Content: This was a bad purchaseScratched up and cracked on cornerHas someone else's name engraved on backWith scratches carved through the name very disappointed

Reviews.Title: Apple Computer
Reviews.Author: M.N.
Reviews.Content: My husband and I are seniors and we wanted a I-pad to use for Skype and Facetime. Our children walked us through the process and we love it! My husband enjoys crossword puzzles and uses it to help him with the puzzles.With practice we are becoming to like it more and more each day. It's easy to use and we use it every day to check the weather, news, etc.. This was a perfect item for us "older folks" to keep up with modern technology and keep in touch with family and friends.

Reviews.Title: The i-Pad 2 has the most Important Improvements over the !st Generation Model
Reviews.Author: L. Northington "Jaw 2th"
Reviews.Content: That is why I chose it over the newer models. I also bought the camera adaptors which work just fine. I highly reccommend themfor those who want to load photos directly from a digital camera. Get a word processing App (I like Doucuments2) and you can load text/data also. I have not tried to transfer video directly from my video camera but I plan to see if that is possible. Glad I bought the 64GB model.I have an i-Pod Touch for when I need a very portable  small, pocket size  lightweight device. However the battery life on the Touch is short compared th the i-Pad2. Of course one must have a laptop/desktop/printer for the heavier tasks. And now I have the i-Pad2 for medium size tasks with medium portability, increased functionality and plenty of pure digital fun/toy possibilities.  The operating system on this device is tried and true and by now has been tested over time. The screen and visuals are quite acceptable to these eyes. If you need more in terms of visuals then you may require one of the newer models. Otherwise the 'improvements' in the generations following the i-Pad2 are mostly cosmetic in this users humble opinion.I save 5 stars for perfection. This device falls only slightly short of that.Highly reccommended.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny - and then some!
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: I purchased an Ipad 2 because I wanted a way to get my textbooks for class and not have to carry them all around in a heavy backpack.  Imagine my surprise when I discovered, not only can I do this, but at half the cost!  No heavy backpack, and over the last to semesters my Ipad has payed for itself in what it has saved me in textbook costs.  But that isn't even all of it!  I created a Dropbox and now I can look at documents for class, or review notes I have created while I am waiting for class.  I have also downloaded study help apps and homework apps that keep me up to date on what assignments I have coming up.I also love the plethora of games and other activities available for when I have downtime.  If is a lot of fun!My other favorite thing about this ipad is that I can watch movies, tv shows and everything else under the sun.  It is crisp and clear and the big screen is wonderful!Love love love this device!

Reviews.Title: I am in love with my new ipad
Reviews.Author: Ashley Moore
Reviews.Content: I was.sort of afraid to spend so much on a ipad cuz.I was.not familiar with tjem and didn't know anything about them but in so glad I did. I love it. There so many cool things u can do. Tons of great apps. Very great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: November Hardway
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time and works great. It even had less less little scratches on the back than I expected. It looked almost new.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Melissa Bowling
Reviews.Content: was able to pass the IPod touch to the kids, but now find they are sharing my IPad and the IPod so they both have something to play on!  Easy to set up and use.

Reviews.Content: I am absolutely in LOVE with my iPad 2(: I couldn't ask for more. Apps Flawless, movies flawless, screen& pictures are amazing!!!!Likes1. Screen2. Resolution3. Keyboard4. IMessage5. Battery6. Build Quality7. iOS GeniusDislikesHaven't found any!!!!!

Reviews.Content: i was told that my order would be shipped to me and in my hands on december 31,2012. I got an email stating that it was shipped out to me on the 31 and I would recieve it on January 2,2013.. So now I have to go back to active duty without my ipad2. ARMY SOLDIER!!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: patty gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I have a Galaxy phone, so I thought lets try apple. Like it a lot, but most of the apps are paid, in galaxy they have a "black market" so.... My mom's galaxy tablet has on the camara FLASH to be able to take pictures at night, this one doen't. that's why I'm giving it a 4 stars. SHOULD HAVE FLASH ON THE CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Kyle Weatherly
Reviews.Content: I know the IPAD 2 is not the newest but this unit has always done what I need.  I needed more memory so I bought a second one and my last one is being used by someone else.  Great deal on IPAD 2 as well, now that the others are available.  I have never had a problem with the screen on the IPAD 2 so really don't see the need for the high res on the IPAD 3 especially when you give up the battery life in exchange.  I know people with the IPAD 3 that would go back to the IPAD 2 if they had it to do over again.  - My opinion

Reviews.Title: In good shape, but no AC adapter
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: We're lucky that we live in a household with extra iOS products around, because without an AC adapter this would be useless.

Reviews.Title: Great item! Love it!
Reviews.Author: ACL
Reviews.Content: Why spend all the money on the latest model when this one is so similar? We opted for a used iPad, with 64 gb of memory. So happy with it. Fit many movies on it for our kids as well as ALL of my hubby's music and videos. Hubby happy, kids happy and wife is happy. What more could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Melissa Jeffords
Reviews.Content: This is everything I expected and more. Very easy to use and understand. Fast and no problems. Nice clarity. Good sound. Apple makes the best. Would recommend it over any other tablet.

Reviews.Title: some things are just great
Reviews.Author: Dean P. Yoder "azmystrow"
Reviews.Content: My first one got stolen, and if I had to say there's room for improvement, they could work on some security app that would taze the person holding the IPAD if it were stolen, something basic like that.  Otherwise, it's so easy to use and the ICloud thing saved me.  I had just been on a trip with my old IPAD and all my photos were on that one.  Luckily it had updated just before getting stolen, and all the pix were on my phone as well.  Very happy camper!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Twatson
Reviews.Content: Ian in love with this device, it's quick very sufficient.The shipper sent the product out very quickly. I do all my schoolwork on it& the battery life is awesome

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Josh D. Ladd
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a replacement for my OG IPAD and couldn't be happier. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Jim Riggs "My First Aid Company"
Reviews.Content: It works great love it.  However going forward I would not by a cellular device I would save the money and purchase only a wifi device saving a lot of money.  Free wifi is everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids and seniors!!
Reviews.Author: M. Holley
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad for my two sons who are 5 and 3 because I was sick of them changing the settings and doing weird stuff to my laptop even with windows live family safety installed. This was my best purchase of the decade. The parental controls are amazing. I have Safari, iTunes, App Store, etc. all disabled. They have about 13 movies, 64 apps (mostly educational apps for letter tracing, coloring, baby Spanish, and so on), 28 books, and even Netflix for the weekends. They learned how to use it VERY QUICKLY! Within a day of showing them how to do stuff no more than once, they've pretty much mastered it. I have an Otterbox Defender case on it because they do abuse it quite a bit. When watching Netflix I hook it up to the TV so they don't have to worry about holding it. When we do leave the house and are away from WIFI they have plenty of content to keep them happy, esp in the car on long trips.I have an iPhone so I haven't use it for myself yet. If you have PC and are used to Windows 7 you will feel the iPad is extremely limited on what you can do. The onscreen keyboard is very awkward for my small hands when typing because the letters are so spaced out. My WPM drop dramatically on the iPad but pairing it with a Bluetooth keyboard I imagine will fix that problem, except that I've yet to see one that comes close to my Windows Keyboard. However, I just installed Windows 8 on my PC and I hate it so much I am considering selling it and purchasing an iPad for myself.I'm also saving up to get one for my 67 year old daddy whom calls me weekly asking me how to get the sound and video back working on Skype and how to get back to his FB page on his laptop. Some people just don't need a lot of settings to control!

Reviews.Title: Lovin' it!
Reviews.Author: Linda Knapp
Reviews.Content: Using it all the time.  Learning to use it as a reader and ALL the other things it can do!  Enough for me!  good service from this dealer!

Reviews.Title: Great product, even better price!
Reviews.Author: Katie Katzenberger
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my iPad 2 purchase on Amazon. The item was exactly as described and arrived within a couple of days! Super easy to set up with Verizon and I have used it tons in the week I have owned it. Can't believe I didn't buy one earlier but the price I got was well worth waiting for...got a fantastic deal!!

Reviews.Title: Poor wifi , drops 3G and wifi constantly
Reviews.Author: Danni "Danni"
Reviews.Content: It's not the router . Our laptop , and 2 iPhones work fine and pick up strong signals while the ipad 2 struggles to connect to networks even whilst sitting in front of a router . And it's not out router.. It's pretty much all wifi , whether my home, my parents or friends homes the thing struggles to get 1 bar . and as for 3G many times it says there's no SIM card detected . Doing much research I come to find out its a common issue with ipad 2 and Apple seems to not want to own up to this glitch .take it I. To apple and yes , they admit its a faulty antenna or wiring issue and its $250 to fix ( keep that in mind if you buy a refurb or pre owned w/o warranty )  I stumbled across an apple message board to a thread 130 pages deep of people all complaining the same issue . Just be aware that the ipad 2 when it does feel like working , is pretty great , but its temperamental and you'll never quite know if it will be a good day or a bad day with your ipad . The only temporary resolve is flipping it in and off airplane mode to stop it from freezing up, which I tend to do about 5 times a day . When it works , I love it .. Guess that's all I can say about that .

Reviews.Title: BEst
Reviews.Author: Marco Acevedo
Reviews.Content: Pros: This is the best tablet out there in the market right now.Cons: the screen is really fragile and you should buy a cover the same thing you buy this.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my Tween
Reviews.Author: Kim M.
Reviews.Content: My daughter has been wanting one sine i got my first one.  She is going to go nuts on Christmas morning and am so glad i was able to get her started as a Apple consumer.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: kiwi2590
Reviews.Content: One of the best items on the market. Great for Students becauseyou will never need another sheet of paper with Apple iTunes Apps.

Reviews.Title: Never though this device would be as useful as it is!!!!
Reviews.Author: Joseph D. Land
Reviews.Content: I always thought the iPad was kinda stupid. It seemed like an overgrown iPod touch and nothing more. My mind is now changed. I live in a very rural area and internet service is 80-90$ a month and extremely slow. So I had an idea "hey, what if I use the 3G on an iPad as a supplement to wifi in my area. Turns out Verizon works great in my area and it is only 30$ a month with NO CONTRACT. I had no idea you could get 3G without a contract, for me that really sealed the deal. Now I am using Internet that is actually FASTER then wifi in my area!  Since in am savings 50-60$ a month, the savings will pay for the device in 10months and end up saving me hundreds upon hundreds of dollars. I love it!The Internet is surprisingly easy to navigate and the touch keyboard is much easier to use then I thought it would be. If you are in an area where Internet is pricy and all you really do is surf the web, consider getting an iPad as an Internet device. I am pretty sure you can tether it to a laptop anyways and use Internet.For me, the iPad is an important, practical and HUGE money saving device !!!

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 is awesome.
Reviews.Author: -L-
Reviews.Content: Owning both the iPad 2 and iPad 3, there really isn't much of a difference unless you use 4G/LTE or want to play the very very select few games that run better on the iPad 3.  The iPad 2 doesn't heat up.  The iPad 3 does.  The iPad 2 is a bit thinner and lighter (not much but notable).  Contrary to what I'd expected, the 2540x1480 screen is almost useless.  You still browse the web at only 720x1280, and most other commonly-used tasks.  Only a handful of games are made for 2540 resolution; therefore, it's practically useless given the iPad 2 is nearly half the price of the 3rd and 4th generation (which are both too similar to distinguish). While the A4/A5/A6 processors differ, it doesn't translate into real life differences in overall performance for watching videos, mail, web browsing, etc.  IMO the iPad 2 is s till the best tablet to come out in the past 3 years given that it's about half the price as those of its successors.

Reviews.Title: There is a reason Apple is #1
Reviews.Author: Lola Cava "Lola"
Reviews.Content: Ok it took me a while to jump on the Apple bandwagon, but I finally did.  Although I purchased a used Ipad2 (didn't want to still pay 500.00) I have to say it is worth it.  I have 2 kids 8 and 4 and as I told my father, there is just something about a device that you hand to your 4 year old and he can figure out how to use it.  He definitely knows more than my husband.  I use it for games e-mail, news.  My kids do games, math, watch Disney shows and fight over it, so much so that I might have to get another one but I am still not willing to spend full price will probably still look for a used model, works great for us.

Reviews.Title: It's good
Reviews.Author: GenderBender
Reviews.Content: What can I say. It is a overpriced Apple product and works as intended. Buy a Kindle fire HD and go out and eat with the savings.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: JamesDWitmer
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet device, so I don't have a lot to compare it with. But except for some difficulty with some web forms not responding to touch input, it has been a great solution for someone who doesn't need a laptop, but wants to do some writing away from my desk.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: BCR
Reviews.Content: This product worked great and was a great deal. Adaptable and functional, this product opens up all kinds of possibilities for entertainment and more functional applications.

Reviews.Title: iPad2mc979ll/a
Reviews.Author: Roy L. Howe
Reviews.Content: I am still trying to get on to all of its wonderful qurikesIt is the first touch screen application that I have used..

Reviews.Title: Buy it!
Reviews.Author: Suepurple
Reviews.Content: The iPad 2 is the most fun item I've bought in a long time.  It's very easy to use.  I've become addicted to it.

Reviews.Title: After One Year With The iPad It's Still A Fun Toy
Reviews.Author: Darren O'Neill
Reviews.Content: Since there are a ton of reviews already talking about the specs and such of the iPad 2, there's no need to rehash them again here.  Instead I want to share my experiences living with the iPad 2 for about a year now.The main use for this device has been web surfing while sitting on the couch in front of the TV.  There's no doubt that we're moving to a multi-screen world and it's nice to be able to look something up on IMDB.com when watching something on TV or to check your email during a commercial break while watching a ballgame.  It is not my main web surfing machine, I don't have the best eyes and I'm addicted to my 24" screen on my desktop, but the iPad does nicely for light web use.As an e-reader the iPad 2 isn't horrible, it's just nowhere near as good as a Kindle which means the only things that really get read on the iPad are books I have in PDF files, such as a Photoshop manual where having a nice color display really helps.  We've read some magazines on it, but the screen is really too small to make the a comfortable experience for me.  Your mileage may vary here as some people I know love reading magazines on an iPad.  For me, that experience will be better when there is an iPad that has about a 12" screen size.One thing the iPad is really good at is playing videos.  With streaming apps getting better and better, like the HBO GO app, it's making the iPad more and more useful.  It's nice to be able to take your content anywhere you want in the house.  The screen is absolutely beautiful for playing video content, and once again for extended viewing I'd like a screen that's just a tad bigger than this current one.The performance of the iPad 2 is very nice, everything feels snappy and I've really never felt like the processor was being bogged down while using it.  It feels very nice in the hand and is very sturdy.There is no doubt about it, tablets are useful and they're entertaining but I don't see them ever replacing desktops or laptops for me.  I do a lot of design work though, so my needs are different than most people.  If you're looking for something to check email, surf the web and catch some video content then the iPad will be perfect for those needs.The bottom line is if you're going to get a tablet it's still hard to beat an iPad.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 WiFi
Reviews.Author: baydogs
Reviews.Content: I have never had Apple products except for an iPod.  My daughter & son in law talked me into switching to an iPhone 5 and getting an iPad.  I am impressed.  How did I get along so long without an iPad. And the service was fast and exactly what I expected it to be.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: julgwena
Reviews.Content: Product is fine, I just have a regret concerning documentation, there was nothing at all. Otherwise, quality is perfect. I recommend strongly!

Reviews.Title: Love the iPad 2
Reviews.Author: G. Hartshorn
Reviews.Content: I have owned and loved my iPad 1 and waited for the iPad 3 to come out so I could afford to buy the 2. My grand kids and I are all delighted with the upgrade to the 2.I watch movies using the HDML adaptor 2 or 3 times a week and am pleased with the quality and lack of stutters.Both the 1 and the 2 have been used as my primary readers using the Kindle App. I usually read 2 to 4 books a week (I'm retired) and don't have a problem with screen glare. If I'm outside I find shade to read in.It's hard to find anything to complain about but I do find it gets a bit heavy when reading in Bed.A solid Five Star product purchased from AMAZON.COM.

Reviews.Title: What was I waiting for? So glad I finally got my iPad 2!
Reviews.Author: K. Parsley "kindlekat"
Reviews.Content: The iPad 2 is portable and versatile with a great color display and is owner friendly when it comes to ease of use. I read, play games, watch movies, and surf the net with my iPad 2. It is so much lighter and easier to use than a traditional laptop. The Safari web browser is lightning fast and works great for all applications. A top of the line product!

Reviews.Title: Perfect tool for.... EVERYTHING!
Reviews.Author: Annawantsaniphone
Reviews.Content: I have had an iPad 2 for a little over a year. It was a gift and I can't get enough. From what I heard this is just as good as the new iPad. O with this, it's amazing for work play, and sitting in a snuggle watching YouTube and playing solitaire.

Reviews.Title: As represented
Reviews.Author: Peter A. Goodell
Reviews.Content: The used iPad2 that I ordered arrived within the timeframe promised and is in like-new condition. It was in the original packaging with all attachments included. The outer packaging was torn, leaving some of the inner package exposed; however, the product was not damaged.  As for the iPad2, it is indistinguishable from my 3rd generation iPad, except that it is noticeably lighter in weight, and is thus easier to hold. Having used the 3rd generation iPad for several months, I see no reason to pay the extra $$$ for it over the iPad 2. Unless one has ultra-superior eyesight, the display on the 2 is just as good as the 3.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Kitcat
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, fits in my purse, can connect almost anywhere. We carried it everywhere on a recent trip to Greece with pre-loaded maps and metro and museum schedules etc. Took lots of good pictures too.  While on a long train ride the kids played games. Good for the whole family.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ryan Fick "The Alpah and the Omega"
Reviews.Content: Really glad I got a used iPad2 for a cut rate instead of paying almost double for the brand new iPad3. Went to the local worst buy and checked out both of them side by side and not much difference. If needed super amazing retina graphics for some reason, I'd get the 3, but otherwise, why pay more? It works really fast, is SOO nice to have. It's like a digital magazine, email and web browser, and everything else into one. And super portable. So glad I finally got one, it's so nice to have.

Reviews.Title: Very please with customer service and product.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Upon receiving the Ipad we had taken it out of the packaging and went to charge it.  It wouldn't charge so I had sent in a rating and note to this supplier to have them contact us or advice us of next action.  They immediately called and was completely helpful and understanding.  It turned out the ussue had nothing to do with the purchased item at all.  The ipad wouldn't charge because the outlet in the house was not working.  Thanks to this purchase....we were even able to find out that we needed to get that outlet repaired.Thank you for your immediate attention and i do apologize for any inconvenience or possible reduction to your excellent service.My intention was never meant to do that but only have you contact us to advise how we could fix this issue.Many thanks,Steven Sousa

Reviews.Title: Nice functional toy for travel
Reviews.Author: nvlystd "Steve"
Reviews.Content: Was in the market for a tablet to be used during a planned international trip. I didn't want to lug mt 17" laptop through airport security and on to my destination. After considering cheaper options, including Samsung Galaxy and small 10-12" notebooks, I decided on the Apple. I've been using Apple IPOD's Classics for many years to store my ITUNES music library to play while at home, during trips and in my motor vehicles without any issues during the warranty periods and beyond. After speaking to both friends and family as well as reading reviews here on Amazon I decided to purchase the IPAD 2 16GB version. It's my first tablet & all I can say is it functions perfectly in my home using a refurbished Netgear 3500 wireless router for WIFI and a Bluetooth keyboard case from Trent also purchased here on Amazon. Screen resolution for the IPAD 2 is sharp & using the Safari browser for accessing my emails & internet browsing is easy to get acclimated to.  For those who wonder if they should purchase the Apple Care extended warranty I suggest no unless you are planning on dropping the IPAD on a hard surface!

Reviews.Title: When They Said New... They Meant Brand New!!!!
Reviews.Author: heywood jablowme
Reviews.Content: Awesome, what can I way, item is awesome and was brand spanking new when I got it, I expected a returned item to have the initial item shrink on iPad to be missing, but it wasn't it was great, amazingly fast shipping, super seller!!! Very trustworthy in the descriptions so don't worry, what you're seeing you're getting.  Thanks so much!!!

Reviews.Title: Moving up!
Reviews.Author: blasjas26
Reviews.Content: This is a case of moving up from an IPhone to an IPad!  Only issue was it was received witha dent on the corner, even though it was in its packaging which did not appear dented.  Itfunctions as advertised and the screen size is so much more readable than the phone.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 is Still a Contender
Reviews.Author: Bruce Churchill "Viking CO"
Reviews.Content: We recently ordered the iPad 2 from Amazon for our Daughter-in-Law's graduation from San Diego State University's graduate program in Nursing. We were very happy with the ordering and delivery experience. The iPad 2 is a viable alternative to the iPad 3 if pricing is an issue. The only sacrifices are in not having the Retina display and a lesser megapixel camera - the iOS software and apps are all the same. iPad 2 dimensions are the same as iPad 3 so all iPad accessories are transferable. We opted for the Verizon 3G version even though our daughter uses AT&T; cell phone service. You can do this because iPad 3G service can be activated without a long term contract and in general Verizon's data coverage is better than AT&T; in our daughter's service area.

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: My mom recently bought this ipad and loves it. It is well worth the price and is alot of fun playing. There are soo many things you can do such as watching movies, playing apps, searching the internet, listening to songs, overall its just a wonderful item to have. The screen and color is beautiful, and movies come out wonderful on the screen.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: Mimisan99
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad and find myself using it everyday.  I wish I would have realized that it didn't have the 3G before I purchased it.  I would recommend making sure it has 3G just so you can have the option.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Happy with the Apple iPad. Plenty of storage for my Wife's needs and having the Verizon data plan should give very good coverage.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: mrbert29
Reviews.Content: Cant go wrong with an Apple IPad.  What else can be said about this product that has not already been stated?  For Less than $399 it was a steal!  One definite is that this ipad2 is much more than what the average user will ever need!

Reviews.Title: IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Abby
Reviews.Content: We chose to buy the IPad because at the time I thought it was important to get my son familiar with technology and I knew that there were a lot of educational apps that we could download for the iPad. So far our whole family absolutely loves using the iPad. We are always looking for a new application to download. This is a great piece of technology because the whole family can use it. My daughter who is 2.5 and my son who is 4 have absolutely no problem using it. My husband and I also use it for many different things. The best thing is that we can take it in the car and the kids can watch videos off of Netflix. We have a screen protector and a case on our iPad and it has been very durable. The kids have dropped it, stepped on it and carry it around with them and it doesn't have one scratch on it.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific product. My wife bought me one foe Xmas and suddenly it turned into ours. She now has her own and my sex life has decreased because it's very addictive.

Reviews.Title: This is a great devic but the screen ugh!!!!
Reviews.Author: Brian W
Reviews.Content: My screen cracked within 6 days of having this it fell exactly one inch and bam iPad cracked but I digress this is a awesome device and pages looks better here than on my computer it is great for productivity and just plain fun and games I love it just I wish it wasn't so fragile

Reviews.Title: The good, the bad, the bottom line.
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: The good: Apple's iPad 2 is dramatically thinner and boasts front and rear cameras, FaceTime video chat, a faster processor, and 3G options for both AT&T; and Verizon.  The bad: The iPad's screen resolution hasn't budged, photo quality is mediocre, there's still no Adobe Flash support, and ports for HDMI, USB, and SD all require adapters.  The bottom line: The iPad 2 refines an already excellent product. Its easy-to-use interface, vast app catalog, and marathon battery life bolster Apple's claim to being the king of tablets. Overall, I would recommend you buy this.

Reviews.Title: I love this device
Reviews.Author: Sam Smith
Reviews.Content: I have the white iPad 32gb with wifi.  This product has changed the way I do thing for school and at home.  Now instead of lugging around a heavy laptop, I can take this to class and have all my books, notes, and the internet with me.  It has made studying a lot more streamlined.At home, the iPad is excellent.  I love that I can add a new interactive level of entertainment to some TV shows!Overall it's another solid product from Apple.

Reviews.Title: Best electronic product I have ever purchased
Reviews.Author: RR
Reviews.Content: Without a doubt, my iPad is by far the most useful and FUN electronic purchase I have ever made.  I wish I had purchased it before spending money on other products, which are nice, but not as wonderful as my Apple iPad.  This statement is coming from a 71-year old who has had NO problems with it.  One more important thing........AMAZON is a great company to work with.  You can even speak to a human if need be.  I am sending this via iPad since my 2- year old computer is being repaired!!!!

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2white
Reviews.Author: aml
Reviews.Content: It came with factory package. But, wificonnection is defected. I had to go to apple store and shown them the defect. I got a new one replaced.

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: K. CLARK
Reviews.Content: I love playing games, searching the web, typing things on my ipad2.  It is quite a bit lighter then the original ipad.

Reviews.Title: IPad 2
Reviews.Author: vdvelasq
Reviews.Content: I love my IPad! I still have much to learn about its full features but it's great for web browsing, checking e-mail and social networking. I purchased the wifi one because I don't need another monthly expenditure. However, it's great for books too. I can't wait to save money by purchasing e-textbooks instead of getting ripped off by the bookstore at my school.

Reviews.Title: Not for Me
Reviews.Author: P. McWhorter
Reviews.Content: I feel like I might be the only person in the world who does not like the Ipad 2. Basically, its functionality is somewhere between an iphone and a laptop. The first issue that I have with it is that it is expensive and does not fit in my pocket. That means that if I go to town, I really can not take it with me because I would be afraid if I set it down or took my eyes off of it for a minute it would get stolen. I can not walk around holding it all day, so pretty much I have to leave it at home. When I am at home, I have a computer in just about every room, so really dont know what I need the ipad for. It does not really do anything that a computer does not already do.When I travel, space in the carry on bag is a premium. I tried travelling once with this, and leaving the laptop at home, and it was a disaster. It will handle routine email, but if you need to edit a document, or interact with a web site that has flash, you are out of luck. I went to Africa with this instead of a laptop, and ended up on the phone for long periods trying to get someone back in the states to handle the business items I could not do on the ipad. So, when I travel if I already have to take an iphone and a laptop, what niche does the ipad fill?In optimizing my carry on for travel, I take an iphone, a small laptop, a good Sony camcorder, and the canon powershot elph. The ipad gets left home.Bottom line is that I would not buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Kizzy
Reviews.Content: "Looks Brand New, No scratches on screen or back. Clean screen, Runs fast. Seller shipped immediately. This is a gift and all parts came with the original box (various inspection stickers on box). I was skeptical about buying used from Amazon and an unknown seller but I am completely satisfied. I've used it for the passed 4 days now (product arrived in 5 days-including weekends). Works great!" seller got a perfect score. Shipping was safe with tamper tape untouched. Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Must have!!
Reviews.Author: MT "MT"
Reviews.Content: I love my new IPad and I would recommend it to anyone who likes the ease of getting on the internet, reading emails, and reading e-books.It's a hot commodity in my household and everyone wants to use it.Worth the money for lots of enjoyment time with whatever your computer needs!

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Scarsdale
Reviews.Content: I received my order as promised and very happy with my ipad2. It's exactly as it appeared online and the product performs to perfection.  I also took it to Apple Store and everything checked out.  I'm glad I purchased my ipad2 & the price was affordable too.

Reviews.Title: like it alot!!!
Reviews.Author: amber6297
Reviews.Content: well i really do like this product!! i do think that the app store needs more interesting and fun games but the ones they do have are okay.....i use it all the time for everything! i even typed a script for english class on it although i couldnt find out how to print it! anyway ovrall i think if you have the first generation you dont need to upgrade because my freind has it and she says its just fine!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great start, but a few issues
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Maeurer Jr. "Rob from NYC"
Reviews.Content: For a Windows only user, this is a pretty good transition to touchscreen based computing.  Best feature for Windows users - SUPERFAST BOOT TIME EVEN WHEN POWERED OFF.  There are a few hiccups though.  Cut, Copy, and Paste can be tricky.  Transitioning between applications are fairly easy by pressing the home button twice.  Another issue is usb.  It's pretty much non-existent.  Some forums state you might get lucky with your usb device using the camera connection hookup from Apple, but the only file types that can be read are pics.  The biggest complaint is the same as many windows users going to an Apple product - NO FLASH.  Overall it's pretty good, but I recommend the 32 gb over the 16 gb if you have the money like most Apple veterans tend to have.  Added on 10/17/12: It's been 6 months now:  An issue that unfortunately seems prevalent among many ipad users is the home button losing responsiveness.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet
Reviews.Author: Jwoods. "Be"
Reviews.Content: Ok At first I was like should I spend so much money on a tablet hmmm.all I can say now is that I made the best purchase I have made in a long long time.so go ahead you wont regret it .not compatible with flash player but still the best purchase .: )

Reviews.Title: Like New!
Reviews.Author: Jasmine
Reviews.Content: I have to admit I was a little worried about buying a refurbished iPad. But as soon as I opened the package it was like new. There's a tiny scratch on the side but I probably would have done that on my own. This is one of my best investments, I got a great apple  product without the apple price.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: Ed E "Ed"
Reviews.Content: Buy the insurance, if you drop it, the insurance pays for itself.  Very easy to use. Apple support for their products is unmatched.

Reviews.Title: Wife Loves it
Reviews.Author: Christopher S. George "Dilligaf73"
Reviews.Content: Initially bought the Impression Tablet from HSN and all I can say is that that product is garbage. After coordinating to send it back and get refunded, I ordered my wife the IPAD2. This was right after Christmas by the way, and we have yet to have a single issue with the IPAD2. I have a rather cheap in cost wireless router, and the IPAD can reach it from anywhwhere (2k sf) in my house. Has never froze and had to reboot! Highly recommend this product to anyone. Wife mainly uses it for apps for the kids! They love it also and I find the apps very educational. Only downside.... the price. Hence the 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Wanted an Ipad alternative BUT...
Reviews.Author: Onepingonly "onepingonly"
Reviews.Content: I really wanted an ipad alternative tablet.  After reviewing all the possibilities,  I bought the ipad2 with 64 gig.  All the non-apple tablets had way too many horror stories, both from a hardware / software and a customer support point of view.The drawbacks to an apple operating system were vastly out weighed by the problems reported with the alternatives.Do youself a favor and buy the apple.  You'll be glad you did.

Reviews.Title: This is really what I wanted
Reviews.Author: suzatm
Reviews.Content: In November of 2011 I bought the Amazon Fire mostly because I wanted to stream their Prime movies.  The screen for movies and tv shows was fantastic though the wifi connection would keep dropping in the middle of streaming. The more I used the Fire the more I realized that it wasn't able to give me what I wanted.  It did not have a large enough amount of device itself storage space,I could not turn the backlight down low enough to make it comfortable for me to read, I could not download the BN reading app to read my BN book library, and the screen really wasn't large enough to comfortably browse the internet or read magazines.  I started looking at the Ipad 2 and after what I saw from a co-worker's IPAD I gifted my Fire to my sister and bought my own Ipad.  I absolutely love it!  It has given me everything that I wanted - most specifically the fact that I can have the Amazon reading apps and BN reading app on the device and can read both bookstore's library on the same device.  I had purchased the 16 mb but two days later upgraded to the 64 mb.  The backlight can be turned down to being almost off, browsing is great, reading my emails is easier now. The wifi connection is solid up in my room where the Fire would keep dropping the connection. I am amazed at how much you can do with this device with the different apps.  It is always with me!  True it is heavier than the Fire - it's more like reading a hardback book, but the print is big and the backlight is softer on the eyes.  Also true is the fact that I now cannot watch the Amazon Prime movies and tv shows, but ITunes has a lot to offer even though you have to pay for it.  Small trade-off in my opinion since I am mostly a book person - not a movie person.  Now if Amazon were to make a bigger Fire and take care of some of the issues I mentioned above - the Fire could definitely give the IPAD a run especially having the Instant Prime Video behind them but for now I would recommend the IPAD 2 over the Kindle Fire.  p.s.  My sister really likes the Fire and is very satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: e.langguth
Reviews.Content: A year ago, nobody had an iPad. Then Apple sold 15 million of them in just nine months, creating a whole new category of technology product. The iPad may have become, in the words of Steve Jobs, "the most successful consumer product ever launched."It turns out that a lot of people saw the iPad's appeal: it's a supremely portable device that's well suited for checking your e-mail, surfing the Web, playing games, reading books and other stuff you get off the Internet, and even for getting work done. Kids and the elderly have embraced it.It's awfully hard to follow such a massive success, but that's the task set out for Apple's new iPad 2, which goes on sale Friday. At least the iPad 2 has this going for it: the original model caught the technology industry so flat-footed that only now are true competitors beginning to appear.Those competitors will now face a new iteration of the iPad, one that's faster, smaller, and lighter than the model introduced a year ago--all while retaining the $499 entry price that has proven all but impossible for Apple's competitors to match. It's almost unfair.A game of inches (and ounces)Call it Jobs's Law if you like: The latest version of any Apple product is likely to be thinner and lighter than its predecessor. And so it is with the iPad 2. The size difference between the original iPad and the iPad 2 may seem slight, but that's only because we're dealing with such small products to begin with. But for products this small, every ounce and fraction of an inch counts.The iPad 2 measures 7.31 by 9.5 by 0.34 inches, and weighs in at 1.33 pounds (in the case of the Wi-Fi-only version, that is--the AT&T; and Verizon 3G versions are .01 and .02 pound heavier). That means Apple shaved .17 pound off the Wi-Fi version and .26 to .27 pound off the 3G version. The iPad 2 is also .16 inch narrower, .06 inch shorter, and .16 inch thinner than the original iPad.A matter of small degrees, to be sure, until you consider the percentage change: the iPad 2 is roughly two-thirds the thickness of the original iPad, and 88 percent of its weight (83 percent when comparing 3G models). Pick up an iPad 2 after handling an original iPad, and you'll notice the difference right away. This is a lighter, thinner device.

Reviews.Title: Realistic graphic card
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I had set my background to a field of grass and a week after I bought it my dog took a poop on it.

Reviews.Title: Still the best tablet out there
Reviews.Author: Michael J Russo
Reviews.Content: After being an initial Apple person, back in the 80's, then swaying over to PC, I can see the need to come back to Apple.  The product is so aesthetically and ergonomically well designed.  The touch screen is responsive and the number of functional and fun apps are overwhelming.  The other awesome feature is icloud and the syncing with my daughter's Macbook pro.

Reviews.Title: Product Exactly as Described; Fast Shipment
Reviews.Author: ChrisBill
Reviews.Content: Pleasantly suprised.  A little worried due to being a Christmas present; but item was perfect and arrived early!  Product was exactly as described.  UNOPENED!

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad2
Reviews.Author: E. Zezoff
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my granddaughter.  She loves it.  Item was shipped on time and received as advertised.  Actually, I bought an Apple Ipad2 for my four grandchildren and 2 daughters.  They all love them.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 purchase
Reviews.Author: Linda C. Price
Reviews.Content: I purchased my iPad 2 as a Christmas gift for my husband..not only did it come in well before Christmas even though I ordered it a week and a half before, but it arrived in perfect condition :) I was very satisfied with the seller's prompt customer service, and the quality of the product I received...

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: shelby
Reviews.Content: I love my Ipad. Its my favorite object, ever. i got the white one, but i kinda wish i got it in black though. i would suggest getting a Bluetooth keyboard with it if you think your going to do a lot of typing. but i just love mine. but also i use it in replace of my laptop. even though it doesn't do a lot of things a laptop can, i still love it. also it would print unless you have Airprint. that sucks, but theres an App for that!

Reviews.Title: Amazingggggg!!!
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: This product is absolutely amazing. I've had mine for about a week now and it's superb!! Plus it's reasonably priced. I just absolutely LOVE it!

Reviews.Title: Buy it, you will not regret it
Reviews.Author: tech_guy
Reviews.Content: I found no where on Apple site to place a comment, so here it is.I have had the greatest experience in support I have ever had, I had a problem with my Ipad 2 because the screen was giving bad colors, after taking it to an apple store make an apppoinment and wait to be helped they replaced my ipad with a new one in less than 10 min.I would say that other companies still have a lot to learn from apple, so far the ipad has been a replacement from my laptop at home, I can answer mails, browse the internet, see movies and all I even move pictures to the ipad to be modified ( applications are cheaper and good at making basic modifications in pictures), it is all I ever wanted.. So if it is expensive , yes!!! is it worth it?? Yes!!! every penny .. Support is amazing!!! I would buy another one for my kids??? already !!!

Reviews.Title: The iPad 2 will change how you interact with the world and your media!
Reviews.Author: James L Kalabus
Reviews.Content: I admit when I first heard about Apple making an iPad I was skeptical about how practical the device would be.  Fast forward to the present, and having used the iPad 2 for 2 months, I can honestly say it has transformed my digital life in our increasingly digital world.  My desktop and laptop have been gathering dust since acquiring the iPad 2.It is the ultimate way to interact with just about all things digital.  With the right apps, you can do just about anything you can on a laptop, television, and gaming system, all in one sleek, stylish, and utterly portable device!  On a regular basis I use my iPad 2 to surf the web, compose and read e-mails, open and edit Microsoft Office documents, watch movies, listen to my MP3 collection, take and browse photos, make financial transactions, and play games that are just as good as what I can play on a computer or dedicated video game system.I'm hard pressed to come up with a single thing I dislike about the iPad 2.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it!
Reviews.Author: Laura Sirikulvadhana
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad... White... 64gb... New...It works well... I use it for the internet and play games. I also do my amazon online shopping.Pros:* easy to use* convenient to travel* lots of space* digital moviesCons:* no flash (all Apple products)* battery can die easily if you charge it a lot* sometimes it doesn't work and you need to restart itOverall:Worth it...Butit'll be cheaper when the iPad3 comes out

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: J. Lindner
Reviews.Content: I'll be the first to admit, I love toys.  Gadgets, gizmos, anything electronic will catch my attention.  THese toys are great, but my fascination is not longterm.  Too soon after I spend my money on the latest "must have" the toy finds its way to the shelf as I move on.  I held off on purchasing an iPad2 because of the cost and because I was fearful it would spend $730 for something I would later stash away nver to use again.  Nothing could be further from the truth.I've had my iPad2 for about three months now and I love it more each day.  I'm using it everyday for several hours.  I use it for my work, and for fun.  I listen to music, watch movies, and play with fun, educational apps.  I have work-related apps.  I use it for my local government role so I do not need to print paper forms and other official documents.  I buy apps but I love the free ones.  It is a challenge to find useful apps for free.  I can manage my investments with it.  I can use Google Earth and travel the world.I no longer consider my iPad2 just a toy.  It is an intregal part of my life as I can quickly check emails and get headline news.  I can follow sports teams and have my music collection.  It is awkward to bring along during hikes, but I do have it in my car for the music.  I have podcasts and iBooks.  It will never replace my laptop, it will not replace my Kindle, but I cannot see myself without my iPad2.I strongly recommend the iPad2 to anyone who is even remotely considering buying one.  You will be amazed at the number of uses you will find for it.

Reviews.Title: A REVOLUTION IN EVERYDAY LIFE
Reviews.Author: EASY TRAVELER
Reviews.Content: The iPad will change the way humans live. It's as simple as that. A few years back you saw stage prop devices like this on Star Trek TNG! Now they are here.This is in the same league as Wheat, Fire, Steel, Flight, Anti-biotics, Sails, Steam.You are on the ground floor of a new age and a new civilisation. This WILL reduce the use of paper and oil. This will make humans much more efficient. Old paper and oil based industries will suffer but that is how it goes...If you can find them, there are apps for a wide array of uses. I can read Conrad, Wharton, Fitzgerald while waiting for a plane or work. I can know where I am in 700 cities and what's around me. I can make a video call.You get the idea. It's only going to get better!I like my iPad.Get as much memory as you can afford. Bigger is better. Get the Griffin Survivor case and the Kensington  sling pack. There may be a way to use flash memory as well.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Amazing iPad2
Reviews.Author: jjones0928
Reviews.Content: The iPad2 is all that is is advertised to be.  There is so much that you can do with it and it is light and portable...I find that I rarely need to pull out the laptop!  Each day I am finding new ways to use it and that makes it that much more interesting and fun.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: umair g
Reviews.Content: once again apple gives us something great!i bought this ipad because of work actually. I work in a hospital and its great to be able to access electronic records/labs/orders quickly while doing rounds. Makes life a lot easier than finding a computer, logging on, then doing it. After work, I can use this if I'm out, sitting at home on the couch, showing off things to my friends, youtubing vids, facebook (stalking), and even watching movies.The screen is beautiful, the weight is just right, and everything about it is so clean and perfect. I do wish the resolution could get a little higher as you can see a difference between it and the iphone4 screen, but i know thats something that will come in the ipad3. If you can wait, the ipad3 should be worth it as it will probably be the same price. If you can't wait, get this, you won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: King of tablets
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: So it doesn't have FLASH - clue here peeps ADOBE STOPPED SUPPORTING MOBILE FLASH. Gues HTML 5 or better will be new standard. The IPad 2 is still the BOSS of tablets PERIOD. Nothing performs as well ....NOTHING !  In short was a Apple hater ( still am) but wanted a smaller form factor than the laptops/net book areana. This replaced my laptop couldn't be happier.  Hate the limitations of Apple World thus have an Android phone (Motorola Droid Bionic used as mobile hotspot). All said n done HIGHLY RECOMMENDED !! Kindle Fire smaller very limited performance compared to the BOSS.

Reviews.Title: The Best  Apple I-Pad
Reviews.Author: Chris_2011
Reviews.Content: This one is user friendly and so easy to upload and down load everything you need. If you had the chance to get this one doit it's really worth it.

Reviews.Title: ipad2
Reviews.Author: Charles Mathewson
Reviews.Content: Product delivered in timely fashion and works great.  Wonderful christmas gift for my wife. She love s it. I would recommend this product to anyone.  She is all set up ready to go.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 is a 5 star product
Reviews.Author: blznefx
Reviews.Content: What a great little device!  I love everything about it so far...ease of use is great and I have not a single complaint so far other than maybe they should ship it with a screen saver applied instead of the cheap plastic you rip off and throw out.

Reviews.Title: Ipad is good
Reviews.Author: J. Ragnauth "Rassman"
Reviews.Content: This thing is amazing.  All the apps.  All the convenience.  So simple to use.  Would recommend it to anyone.  My wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 MC983LL/A Tablet (32GB, Wifi + AT&T; 3G, White) NEWEST MODEL
Reviews.Author: Francisco
Reviews.Content: I think excelent the service and product. The quality is very good. The price is competitive. The trace the product is excelent and safe. I know where is me product and when I have I give me safe and peace other the purchase I do.

Reviews.Title: Having fun!
Reviews.Author: G. Rodrigue
Reviews.Content: As always AMAZON came thru for me. My daughter is loving her iPad!  Had some difficulty getting the item in before Christmas but ordered the week before and they promised it before the 23rd and I received it the 22nd!! Thanks again AMAZON!!

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Morten Johansen
Reviews.Content: I used the ipad mostly for VFR navigation and it is really good for that. I also used it for everything else. The only bad thing is that you cant see tv (atleast the channels I want to watch) because you have to download silverlight and apple wont allow that. Other than that, perfect

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2, Five star
Reviews.Author: ArtBKNY
Reviews.Content: I got my Ipad 2 couple days ago from Amazon and i knew i gonna love it and i do.Little smaller than i expected but that's because i never hold one before.It is fast 16 Gig white color with aluminum back.Very easy to use, 2 cams and it easy to switch between cams just press a button.Any ways if you are thinking about buying one all i can say you will probably love it too.Just one thing you should know about Apple limits with watching videos on web sites and installing different programs, it wont let you do that.

Reviews.Title: just as described
Reviews.Author: big_truck_guy
Reviews.Content: i am always worried when i purchase from a site outside Amazon, especially when the purchase is hundreds.  i took a risk to save some $$.  the ipad came in a week.  it was in a sealed box, everything on the outside in the description was as ordered.  i do not believe this was previously opened.  the device works as expected.  yes i understand it will make way for a newer model in a few months, but the value so far has been fine.  if you are worried, you need to check the return policies.  i would buy this again, especially for commodity items.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Soni Boyce
Reviews.Content: excellent service and prompt.easy to deal with and great follow-through.competitive price, but much simpler orderingand tracking data.

Reviews.Title: Pretty much awesome!
Reviews.Author: TSkins
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife as an anniversary gift and she loves it. I think I spend more time on it than she does. Just doesnt do Flash...boo....its ok cause i dont care. i love this thing. my wife loves this thing. i dont care if Apple is evil terrible people out for our souls, i will still buy these products....just gotta save up for a few pay checks to buy it. and dont be an IDIOT and try get this or one of apples products on launch day or weekend. seriously you can wait a few weeks to upgrade i mean cmon.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: L.oakland
Reviews.Content: Researched for many hours to find the right combination of quality and price.  This item fit both requirements!  In fantastic used condition and I've spent many hours on it already.  All my accessories are also purchased through Amazon.  Love this site!

Reviews.Title: Ipad is nice... skin is great!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Shim
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT! and I just bought a skin from [...]!!! BEST quality wraps I've tried. Found out they use 3M and not the cheap chinese vinyls. They even guarantee a no bubble application.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: DFW Data Services (Corey Bryant)
Reviews.Content: What can I say?  It's an iPad 2!  They are great!  Install iTunes 10.5 and plug it in to sync so that it prompts you to upgrade your OS to iOS 5, it's worth it!  iOS 5 has lots of new features.Get yourself a case for it!  Amazon has tons of cases listed!!  It's worth protecting your investment!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2! Excellent!
Reviews.Author: * Rocky Top Boys *
Reviews.Content: Apple iPad 2....what more can you say! Excellent! It is above and beyond what I had expected! Can't put it down...always something to do!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT!!!
