And for many months now I have compared the iPad at a distance to the Kindle Fire, and I kept coming back with "why would I want to spend $500 on an iPad when I can get a Fire for $200? I already own a laptop. Why would I need so much functionality in an eBook reader?  The iPad solves a problem that I do not have."But the advantages of the iPad only become apparent once you own one. That's when the large screen makes you realize how much you squinted at the Fire's smaller screen. How much smoother the Safari browser works than the Silk browser. And how much better the selection of apps are on the iPad.So, once the new iPad came out and the iPad 2 price dropped by $100, I found myself thinking seriously about it. And before I knew it, I had one. And I like it. I like it a lot.Now, I am still a huge Amazon fan and have no intention of leaving Amazon, so the thought of reading books and watching Amazon Prime videos on a non-Kindle device filled me with a bit of trepidation. Can it all work as nicely on the iPad as it does on the Kindle Fire? The answer is "Yes", with one rather large exception: video. Unfortunately videos (TV shows & movie's) downloaded from Amazon require Adobe Flash which Apple does not support on its mobile devices, so that was my first disappointment. But that's been my only disappointment so far and it turns out that it's not a huge problem at all. All of the other pluses of the iPad make up for that. There is plenty of video for the iPad: it's all on iTunes, and a lot of it is free. The Kindle reader works just fine on the iPad 2, in fact its nicer with the large screen.  Book prices on Amazon and Apple appear to be identical. Although the iPad 2 is larger and heavier than the Fire, it's not that much heavier to be a hindrance and I don't see it being any more difficult to slip into my travel bag. Battery life is about the same. But for sure the apps available on the iPad are a welcome sight compared to the Kindle, in both the quantity and quality. This is really where the scale tips heavily in Apple's favor. Sure, Android has thousands of apps available, but Amazon does not let you have them on the Kindle. You are restricted to only downloading the apps that Amazon has approved for the Kindle Fire, and that turns out to be a disappointingly small number of apps, many of which are of mediocre quality.  I would find myself eagerly searching the Kindle app store for the same apps that I enjoy on the iPhone, only to find that they are simply not available for the Kindle Fire. Apps like Skype, Evernote, TED, PBS,  Dropbox, Voxer, SayHi, WeightWatchers mobile, and plenty more. Another experience that is much better on the iPad is watching the news and documentaries while I walk on my treadmill. The bigger screen is a huge improvement and with all the great apps for news and shows, there truly is no end to what you can watch. Add to all of this the microphone, front & back cameras (I got the Wi-Fi only model), accelerometer, GPS and compass and you now have a much more exciting tablet experience. I also found the Silk browser to be clunky and unresponsive at times on the Fire with tabs & buttons that are small and difficult to press , while iPad's Safari is easier to use and has not even hiccupped. Could it be my wireless router? The distance to the router has not changed, just the tablet, so I call that a Silk issue.So what really changed between the Kindle Fire and the iPad? Me. I thought all I wanted was a good eBook reader and for the last couple of years, the Kindle more than sufficed. But I found out that my needs and expectations have changed and I what I really want now is great tablet. And that's the iPad, hands down.Correction: The wi-fi only model does not have a GPS module, but the location services and digital compass can still show your location for apps that need it. Interestingly, turn-by-turn directions in Mapquest work fine, as long as you have a wifi signal, but unless you have a good wifi signal in your car, GPS is pretty useless.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Mznurse
Reviews.Content: I have multiple apple items. And this is defiantly one if my favs! It's light weight. Convent and helpful. I don't regret my purchase not one bit!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Luke Reilly
Reviews.Content: I got my Apple iPad for Christmas this year and i havent been able to leave its side since. There are truly no limits when using it. I can create and edit any word documents I need for school, watch HD movies, listen to all my music, Skype/ FaceTime, quickly and easily download new songs/ apps/ videos, read books and magazines(mostly at no cost), take great looking pictures, play games... etc. The list goes on and on... and on. The only thing I have had any trouble with at all was installing the new update. I would recommend installing it before putting any media or info on it. It just makes the process alot longer and more frustrating. Reguardless, I think Apple has outdone themselves with this device. It is more than just an oversized/ overpriced iPod. I love my iPad.ps. I recomend getting a Smart Cover.Apple iPad 2 Polyurethane Smart Cover - Gray (MC939LL/A) It protects my beloved iPad very well and is worth more than what I paid for it.Warning: Beware of imitators! They dont work at all and are everywhere!

Reviews.Title: The greatest invention just got an upgrade
Reviews.Author: Amazonian
Reviews.Content: Had been hesitant to purchase an iPad for all these years possibly because I already own an iPhone, and during that time the iPad didn't have enough significant improvement over the iPhone except for the obvious size difference.  But with the newly redesigned exterior, upgraded hardware, and my wife desperately wanting one more than I did, I finally ended up getting one.  So far we are tremendously satisfy and uses it more often than we ever thought we would.The new iPad 2 is slimmer, sleeker, faster, and lighter than it's predecessor while retaining the same display size.  Upgraded with a faster processor, it runs a lot smoother and able to multitask more quickly without getting overheated or apps crashing.  The traditional aluminum back casing makes its return with a sexy sleek taper design.  I always feel the sense of durability and toughness, just an overall very solid constructed piece of work whenever I'm handling it, even when dropped, multiple times.  Both higher megapixel cameras front and back allowing better quality photos, video, and greater facetime moments with family and friends.  These are just the major improvements over the original that I feel is already worth it's purchase.I've tried several different tablets and non is as user friendly and simple to navigate as the iPad 2.  Once you've experience the iPad 2, you will understand why so many people go coco for it.  You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Ipad is king
Reviews.Author: Machiavelli
Reviews.Content: Everyone knows ipad is king. This device is great and will become an important part of your life. Only complaints:Apple tries to control everything you do and everything costs money.Corners should have been better supported so glass does not crack so easilySmart cover does not protect against much.It is great. I barely use my mac pro anymore and do 80% of my work on the ipad. There are still somethings that are a pain on a tablet though.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 WiFi 16 gb review, really impressive device
Reviews.Author: RockShoX "punkrockfan"
Reviews.Content: I'm not an Apple fan by any means of the imagination, but I have to admit that I do own quite a few of their devices.  I learned my lesson to pick and choose what I feel most comfortable using and to not be so stubborn about supporting a company that I dislike.  I should say the only thing I dislike about Apple is their computer operating system.  It's not an operating system for me.  I don't feel comfortable using it and it is definitely much more boring than using a Windows operating system that has a gazillion more software written for it.  I'm a Windows guy, grew up with Windows and dabbled with Linux.  I tried to jump on to Linux band wagon long time ago and attempted to stick to it.  It was after several years that I realized Linux was likely not going ANYWHERE on the consumer side for the foreseeable future.  Linux will always be known as a great server operating system, reliable SAMBA share server, etc, but it will never surpass Windows or OS X.  Even Mac/OS X is popular among the consumers and look what this operating system is built on top of!  That being said, it does me no good to hate Apple just because I feel like it.  I bought their iPad 2 device and have been using it since it's initial launch (I did not buy it the first day of launch online, but definitely 3-4 days afterwards).  This device has been great since I purchased it the first day.  Yes, it does not support FLASH, but I realized this before I decided to buy the iPad.  The screen is sharp, the performance is fast and the screen touch is extremely responsive.  The battery life is really good compared to other devices (e.g. iPhone 4s, iPhone 3Gs).  It is a device for casual usage, you browse, you email, you do stuff for leisure.  I sometimes forget to connect the iPad to the charger over night, but I have not had to charge this device for 2-4 days, depending on how heavy I use it.  It's not like the iPhone where I MUST recharge it each night or else it will DEFINITELY run down the battery to critical level.  Granted, it's the WiFi version so it does not have the techno-complication of having to deal with 3G.  iPad 2 is very stable and robust.  I am definitely the type of person who would take every opportunity to criticize an Apple device, but I have to admit that I have had absolutely no problems using this iPad device.  I have no experience with any other tablet device in the market, but if you are wondering if you should get one or if this is going to be a reliable device, I can definitely say it has been super reliable in all phase it was made for since I received it.  Again, it does NOT support Flash, so be aware of this before you purchase it.  It's light weight, does a LOT of tasks that you can do from a computer and has a whole ton of apps available.  If you want to compare it to a computer, don't try to completely compare it apples to apples (pun intended), because it still isn't as "flexible" as a computer.  My laptop has a built in physical keyboard and mouse, I do not have to purchase a separate keyboard or mouse like I would have to for a iPad (you have to use the virtual keyboard on the iPad).  I can truly multitask on my Windows laptop, on the iPad it's "semi-multitask" at most.  The iPad cannot come close to the laptop's 8GB memory, 750 GB hard drive laptop that can run VMWare, play online multi-player games, store files where-ever I want, in whatever directory I created.  There are SO many things I can do on a laptop that the iPad currently cannot do... so unless you ONLY browse, type a few emails, make a few purchases from Amazon/eBay or other available stores and maybe chat occasionally online... then don't expect this iPad to really replace a laptop or desktop (I'm typing this review via laptop as it faster to do than on an iPad).  One negative about the iPad, but it's not Apple's fault, the Apps that people sell may be written for the iPad only or for iPhone only but sometimes written for both.  This means that if the app was designed specifically for the iPhone and you buy it... then it will not LOOK optimized for the iPad since the screen size on the iPad will make it stretched.  If you purchase the app for the iPad, then it may not even be available for the iPhone (I haven't seen an app for the iPad available for the iPhone).  Often they sell TWO different versions of the same app for both devices, so you have to pay double the amount to use them on your two devices.  Again, this review is about the iPad device, not about how the apps are developed, so overall, the iPad 2 is awesome... highly recommended for a tablet purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great iPad, no wifi detection!!
Reviews.Author: Vic Muellich
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to get my new iPad, I would be using it for school and for my personal schedule. When I got the iPad it took a bit longer to charge but once it charged everything was fine. But when I tried to set it up it wouldn't detect any wifi even though I had a connection on all my other devices like my iPod and laptop.Even at school, where wifi was throughout the whole campus, I was having a hard time detecting wifi. I finally got it but I had to hold my iPad very still and it had a one bar connection even though my classmates, who had surfaces, latptops and iPads, had three bars.Finally I was able to get wifi connection at my home, however I has to be within 3 yds of the router on the other side of the house which was a little inconvienent for my but I was still able to get my work done so i wasn't complaining too much.I had tried factory resets, turning it off-waiting- then turning it back on, letting it die on its own, and I even took it into the Apple store; where they did their own reset. And nothing worked. I believe, and the apple workers also thought, that the attenta may have been burnt out, however there's nothing they can do.I enjoy my iPad, besides having to be very close to the router to get any real work done that requires internet access, everything works great! I'm happy with my purchase but just frustrated with this error.

I thought at first it was just rebooting itself but now it is happening more often and now I have lines on the screen, and it won't shut off even if I hit the start button or power button. I just have lines going toward the top of the screen please contact me to rectify this matter.

The available apps from Apple far exceed anything amazon has to offer.  I'm am a freelance graphic designer and love the amount of helpful design apps available on the apple store.  There is even one that allows me to open a file from my computer and edit designs for customers if I'm away from my desk.  The larger screen size in relation to the kindle fire makes this tablet even more appealing to me.  Don't get me wrong the fire is a good product, but with a kindle app on the iPad to make it a reader for your amazon books...who needs it.  Recommend this product any chance I get.

Reviews.Title: Ehhh...it is what it is....
Reviews.Author: Shannan
Reviews.Content: UPDATED MARCH 5, 2014I am starting to hate this more by the day!! This is WIFI only and well, my WIFI is constantly disconnecting!! It's not just my home network, but anywhere I go!! Thought maybe it was just me, but is asked hubby how his was since I bought them both at the same time last week, and his is doing the same thing!! Ugh...ORIGINAL REVIEW:I'm an Android fan and when my Android crashed, I decided hey I'll buy not one, but two of these things!  Ugh...my hubby loves it, I hate it :(Pros:It is super fast!The battery life is unbelievable! Hubby played games for three hours straight and lost only 20% of the battery life!  I spent hours downloading apps and using them and had the same result. I've been using it non stop since 7am and it's now 10:30am, played my games, used Facebook and a few apps, and now reviewing...I'm at 75%. My android would have been dead long ago as well as the other cheap tablet we have.Cons: my opinion keep that in mind...It's too much of a hassle typing when you're used to a smaller screen. I'm a very fast typist, and this thing is just too big for my liking. Did I know the size? Duh! I may return it for a smaller Android though. If you need a large screen, this is perfect! My mother in law and hubby love it, but again, if you like the smaller screens, it's hard to get accustomed to.Takes FOREVER to set up! Omg, you have to create an IPad ID, an Apple ID, confirm this, confirm that, ugh...Finding apps seems to be mission impossible!  I go to the store, they aren't there!  But if I go to the browser and search, it gives me the Apple download and then I get it. So where the heck was it hiding??All in all, this is one of those 50/50 deals, either you're an IPad lover, or an Android lover. If you love Androids, don't bother. If you love Apple products, it's probably a must have!!

Reviews.Content: This iPad is working great.  Thought I was having trouble with it.  Turned out the problem was with my wireless router.  I upgraded my router and all worked well.  It takes more throughput to run the iPad than to run my laptop, so the it took me a while to troubleshoot since I was still using my laptop wirelessly every day.  I would reset the general settings on iPad, and it would be able to connect to the internet for a bit.  There was an update that I needed, but it crashed the whole thing every time I tried to download it.  Bought a new modem/wireless router at Officemax, hooked all up, and everything is working great!  (Obviously I don't have a contract with AT&T; yet)

Reviews.Title: Great device, even though its 2 1/2 years old
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Shames "DrJeff"
Reviews.Content: This model came out in March 2011, and me and 3 other family members have had one since June 2011.Despite the age of the model it has not become obsolescent like many other gadgets. It runs the latest IOS 7 and apps perfectly. The battery still holds a full charge, and all of the buttons and features still work (I could not say the same about my 4 year old Ipod Touch...).I use it primarily for web browsing, email, Facetime and e-books.This model does NOT have a retina display. Although Retina is nice it makes no difference in day to day use, including viewing photos. So what if I can see dots close up? I am certainly not bothered by them.Sure its fun having the most up to date toy, but having the new Ipad Air would not enhance the enjoyment that I get from the device one bit.Still, it seems like chutzpah for Apple to sell an old model for $400, so if I were in the market, I would look at used/refurbished models. The device is very well built and reliable so I wouldn't worry about getting a used one in good condition.

Reviews.Title: Wi-Fi + SORT OF AT&T;
Reviews.Author: M. Z. Rhoades "Zane"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this particular model because I lost the one I received as a gift.  I don't want the person who gave it to me to find out about the loss.  Also, I cannot afford a new one from Apple.  I chose the vendor Sikksound because of the positive reviews.  I am conditionally pleased with my choice.  The iPad I received was in pristine condition, with an Apple box, charging cord and fast charge plug.  It also came with a textured protective backing.  I discovered that the iPad had been used in Italy because of the formatting and information I found in the settings.  After a series of very courteous and helpful e-mail conversations with Sikksound, I was able to resolve the formatting issues.However, I warn purchasers of used AT&T; iPads of an expensive and cumbersome complication.  AT&T; uses a SIM card to enable cellular data usage.  When sold by Apple, a new AT&T; iPad comes with a SIM card which allows for periodic data usage.  In other words, a cellular data plan may be purchased through the iPad for a month, and then cancelled.  When cellular data is needed again, one can simply by more data for that month, and so on.  Because of it's Italian heritage the iPad I received was equipped with a SIM card incompatible with AT&T; in the U.S.  In order for the iPad to use cellular data, a new AT&T; SIM card was required.  A local AT&T; store installed one without alerting me to the $36 fee, and without explaining that the monthly data plan must be ongoing, or the SIM card is deactivated.  A replacement SIM card from AT&T; is not renewable, like the one which comes in a new iPad from Apple.  The AT&T; store rep deactivated the SIM card within a few minutes after explaining that the data plan must be ongoing.  I only discovered the $36 charge when my bill arrived.  Luckily AT&T; removed it because I had not used any data.I rarely use cellular data because wi-if is so accessible.  However, for those who want to use occasionally use the cellular capability, you might want to do some more research.  I recommend spending time on the phone with, or visiting an Apple store, to find out your cellular data options.

Reviews.Title: After 2 years
Reviews.Author: sauprankul
Reviews.Content: I got this iPad in October 2011, according to the engraving on the back, and since 2 years seems to be the extent of most gadgets' life these days, I simply had to make a review. A good one, of course.PROS:Weight: By far, the most amazing thing about this tablet is that it weighs so little. I believe it weighs less than any other iPad out there, which is weird, but I think the iPad mini is supposed to cater to those who have a problem with that. The iPad isn't meant to be held in one hand, though. It's a real personal computer, only in tablet from, and you must treat it as such. If you need to be able to read in bed or something, get a kindle or iPad mini. However, you'll find that the iPad is very convenient for most uses.Design: The front of the iPad is defined by a single pane of multitouch glass - and a home button. The back is made of aluminum. There is a front camera, a rear camera in the top right corner, and a speaker at the bottom. This simplistic design, which Apple litigiously fought for against Samsung, is in a word, magical. I'm not too much into the marketing stuff, but seriously, there is something extremely premium about Apple products, and I am sure it is more than the pseudo philosophical marketing. The Smart Cover actually works really well, though its necessity is... debatable. Overall, this tablet feels like its worth 500 dollars. Ok, so it's 400 now, but you know what I mean.Durability: The primary user of this tablet is an unhygienic now-9-year-old who is not exactly dexterous and immediately gets on it after school, sin lavar sus manos. If you know glass, you know that the only thing that can really scratch it are minerals. That's right. Not knives or cleats, though they may if you try hard enough. It's finger salts, salt from food, dust, dirt, sand, jewelry like diamonds and quartz. However, today I wiped off all the prints with a damp hand towel and I could count, I kid you not, 3 micro scratches. That's amazing. This tablet has been dropped, probably not from extreme heights, but still. The glass at the corners, along with the aluminum housing, is tattered. There are several deep scratches in the aluminum on the back. However, there are no functional damages to this tablet. That's also very nice. You probably don't need the Smart Cover for its protective aspect. You will however, want it so you can use it for support. It helps a lot.Display: Eek. I'll kick it to you straight; the resolution of this screen is terrible. If your going to be looking at pictures, you're going to be disappointed. 1024x768 doesn't cut it. My 4.5 inch S2 had a resolution of 800x640. I thought it was sub par, but acceptable. The iPad is just bleh. It's colors are amazing though. I don't know too much about outdoor performance, but I've never felt that brightness was an issue, so it's probably ok. What the iPad lacks in detail more than makes up in size. Laying down in bed with a ten inch screen feels so empowering. I feel like I have all the media in the world in my hands, and I almost do.Apps: I don't use my iPad for work. It stays at home most of the time, and at home, I have my desktop. I would assume it would be pretty easy to use iWork to create, but I wouldn't know. *flame alert* I believe Android is better for smartphones, and iOS for tablets. There is a serious lack of tablet apps for android, but I am continually surprised at the growing iOS tablet app ecosystem. However, there are a greater variety of apps on Android, in my experience. The iPad can actually handle games pretty well, despite its age. That all I really need to say. There isn't any calculator or weather or stocks app, but you'll find great alternatives in the App Store.Camera: Why are you reading this? What are you doing with your life? Why would you want to use the iPad's camera for anything except FaceTime? Seriously? Well, that's all you're going to be able to do, because the cameras on the 2 are terrible. Really. I would expect more for 500 bucks, but whatever. It's not a priority. If you ever find yourself in so dire a situation that you need to use the iPad camera, you better invest in a disposable, or something.Battery life: Ho ho. Tee hee. The battery life of the 2 makes me want to giggle. Even 2 years later, the battery life still feels virtually infinite. I can almost guarantee you, you will never have a problem with the iPads battery life. This is because if the square cube principle. The surface area (screen size) increases at rate of the dimensions, squared. The volume, cubed. More volume means more battery. So, theoretically, the bigger the device, the longer the battery life. Oh, and iOS is super efficient, almost forgot that.Performance: Welp, iOS7 is here. Anybody with anything older than 2012 must upgrade to escape the lag! Not so. Though the animations in iOS7 are super slow and can induce "motion sickness", the iPad 2 handles it pretty well. (I swear, auto correct has something against the word we'll.) The gaming isn't bad for such an old device, though I have yet to try out newer games like asphalt 8. However, you'll be able to stream video (not in hd, of course!) and play 2d games  with no hitches. The keyboard does sometimes take a while to pop up and apps do take somewhat longer to load, but hey, we're talking about an old geezer tablet here.Features: I haven't been able to use Bluetooth to transfer files yet, presumably because Apple wants me to upgrade and use AirDrop. Classic Apple. And I'm pretty sure Siri could easily run on the 2. Oh well, looks like we're stuck with... The two doesn't have any gimmicks, per se, to it. It has the dual cameras, but that's about it. There is nothing to show off. Just to experience. FaceTime is great, though. Like, wow. It's really the best video chat technology I've ever seen. If nothing else, I would commend apple on its FaceTime infrastructure. It's simple and fun and convenient, not to mention powerful.Overall: Even after 2 years of not so nice treatment, my 2 is functionally perfect. It really feels amazing to be able to consume content on such a big screen. The thinness and lightness of the device make it disappear as you're using it. FaceTime really is the best interpersonal video chat platform as of today. IOS 7 runs fine on this, but don't expect to be so lucky next year. I was actually shocked to see the price here on Amazon. Really? 400 bucks for a 2011 tablet? When the 5 is just around the corner and will cost only 100 more? Only a fool would buy it now. However, the 2 really bolstered the image of Apple I had. I have a first gen Nano that actually still works for a whole day! I would expect the iPad to do the same. This review isn't recommending that you buy the 2. All I'm saying is that Apple makes the best tablets out there. Even the most hardcore Android fanatic (which I am dangerously close to) could agree on some levels. iPads are feat for consuming content. Maybe even for creating. However, if you want to get real work done, you're going to want to wait for the next generation of windows 8 pro tablets with Broadwell Chips in them. I need an IDE to be able to do programming when I go to college, and the fact that no such software is available for iOS means that I can't take this there. The iPad isn't a complete replacement for a real computer. But it comes pretty darn close.Sent from my iPad

He has been very proficient at using ipad from a very early age. itunes store has a huge selection of learning apps for his age group and younger. My son has been a ipad and ipod user sinc he was about 9 months old, he thinks he is playing, but he is really learning. He is way ahead of where he should be and he has had a ton of fun doing it. After ios 6&7 came out his ipad 1  was no longer able to keep up with the technology of the upgraded apps. I purchased the 64g ipad 2 so he would have plenty of room for his apps since some of the apps can be large downloads. i am able to also to limit what he is able to do in settings and the app store. He can only get apps ifi unlock it. ipad 2 was easy to child lock certain features and content. ipad 2's long battery is great on trips, it keeps him busy and i dont need active wifi for his apps to work. I wish that ipad existed with my other children. I like that he is learning on current to future technology that most daycares or preschools can not provide.  I recommend this to any parent. The ecpense is worth it. A childs education id priceless. ipad 2 is perfect for facilitating that.TJ

Reviews.Title: Far more useful than I had imagined it would - now my constant companion
Reviews.Author: PositiveLogic
Reviews.Content: I have resisted getting a tablet for years. As others have observed, a computer without a real keyboard is weighted toward content consumption rather than content creation (otherwise known as work). To fill the need for a lightweight, long battery life, zero fan/vent portable, I had purchased a Chromeook. Frankly, after the novelty wore off, it was sitting in the drawer more than on my lap.Well a month or so ago, on a whim I got the iPad 2. Within 24 hours of playing with it and discovering both powerful productivity (like aTimelogger and DayOne) and music apps (such as Synthesia, Garage Band) that fill voids in what I've seen as an owner of an Android phone, I became a devoted member of the iPad cult. From there, I tested several keyboards and have settled on the Kensington Ultimate and Logic Fabricskin.Now, after month downrange, it smile on my face hasn't worn off -- the iPad and I are inseparable. It is really an integral part of my life and work.I will probably sell the Chromebook on eBay. This will be the first of many iPads to come as they come out with newer versions.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Sherrie
Reviews.Content: Apple iPad 2 MC979LL/A Tablet (16GB, Wifi, White) 2nd Generation...In perfect condition with a screen protector....that was a surprice :)Love it love it love it.  Great price!

Reviews.Title: typical apple product
Reviews.Author: Mike Harte
Reviews.Content: apple wants to lync all your apple devices. instead they should concentrate on the ipad being setup as a stand alone device. Had to have customer support just to set it up.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Becky Buckler
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad to replace one that only had Wifi.  Now I am able to access the information I need even in places where Wifi is not available.  If I can use my cell phone, I can use my iPad!

Reviews.Title: tootie
Reviews.Author: tootie
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and the person who received it was very happy.  She has used it now for two months and no problem with the product. Yes I would recommend this company in the future.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Morse "cynmor"
Reviews.Content: It's been a real time saver and occupier for my child. Thank you for the smooth machine. So far so good

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: chris stern
Reviews.Content: Terrific buy; I love this iPad! Nasty scratch on screen but I can live with it.....so happy to finally own an iPad...thank you.

Reviews.Title: Just "meh".
Reviews.Author: Jessie Ivey
Reviews.Content: I wish I would have gotten a newer model. I pretty much have given up on this thing, so many apps that I would like to have don't work because it's outdated. I love the iPad in general and still plan to keep it for a while, but it's functionality leaves a lot to be desired. The NPR app works perfectly which is really great, and I mostly just use it for portfolio purposes and if I don't feel like carrying around a bulky laptop. Please listen to folks who tell you that this is not a replacement for a laptop, they are not lying. Seriously. Don't get rid of your damn laptop.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous- what a great Ipad for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Happy Girl
Reviews.Content: I ordered this since I just wanted an IPAd 2 for fun, so why pay for a new one? The price was amazing but I got skeptical after reading some of the seller's reviews.  I wrote the seller myself and was reassured of the product.  It came in 2 days, was well wrapped, it was called Very Good condition- a few scratches on the back, but basically perfect.  It came with an older cover ($40.00 is what it said, but definatley not worth that today, but hey it's a cover), 2 charge cords, clean and working perfectly.  I just ran up to TJ Max to get a new cover- and it really looks like a brand new IPAd for about half the price!  I know I got a very good deal and was happy to have the seller write back immediately for all my concerns, making sure that I was pleased with the product. Don't know what happened to others, but I am very pleased with this product and the responses of the seller.  This was a great deal and I am enjoying every second of my "new" ipad for a great price.  Just get the seller's  email and ask questions if you have them- I feel they were very helpful  and concerned.  Even though this was cheap , it is still a major purchase for me and I feel that this purchase was made in confidence and carried through exceeding my expections.  Thanks IPAD MANIA!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Ralph
Reviews.Content: This exactly what I wanted and the price was great. There were no defects with it only thing was the USB part of the charger was not original so it charged slow but I got a real one and now it charges in a shorter time and the battery last a long time. This was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Jere Mullen "Jere"
Reviews.Content: Decided to update and give iPad 1 to hubby ...  I Like books so I wanted the biggest one.  I don't play games so I wasn't worried about the visual technology for the 3 or 4. When I started looking Apple didn't sell anything but the 16 GB ... When I looked on Amazon I found what I was looking for Amazon never let's me down. Brand new in original unopened packaging great deal!

Reviews.Title: LOve Love Love it!
Reviews.Author: kim d. "KD"
Reviews.Content: This has to be the best purchase I have made in years!I love my Ipad! I didn't even know how to operate one when I gotit and now I take it everywhere I go!

Reviews.Title: Great product great Seller
Reviews.Author: douglas litchfield
Reviews.Content: i am very happy with the Ipad 2 and with this seller.  I was hesitant to buy an Ipad online and from someone other than the Apple Store.  I was very relieved when i received this product undamaged and earlier than expected.  I would highly recommend buy from them again

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: I bought the mini iPad and loved it so much I now have it up for sale. The reason being this technology is so good that the iPad 2 was for me. So I bought it and I couldn't be more happy with it. Thank you Apple

Reviews.Title: it was a birthday gift
Reviews.Author: dennis winn
Reviews.Content: she was very happy with it all her friends went home to tell there parents about it then they all called us

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Justine Robertson
Reviews.Content: The I pad does everything that a new one would have. It came in great condition and I really am loving it so far!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: It works perfectly well. I prefer the apple iPad to any tablet in the market. I have bought for more than 6 people.

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: Erika Lynn Brotzman "e"
Reviews.Content: Product arrived early. Works great. Few cosmetic scratches, but that was explained in description before I purchased it and the cover hides those scratches. The seller makes an effort to make sure the customer is happy with product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Wanda Parnell
Reviews.Content: I love Apple. Hard to beat. I bought this one for my sister. Now she won't be borrowing mine. Worth the money!!!

Reviews.Title: nice for the price
Reviews.Author: H. D. Martinez "Pastor Danny"
Reviews.Content: There was a keyboard that came along with it but it was defective. When I contacted the owner, he stated that it was merely a bonus, therefore he couldn't fix.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Tasha Downum
Reviews.Content: Great for Traveling or watching movies. It shipped and was delivered in sooner than expected! It did have a dent on the side which doesn't allow me to turn the volume up or down, contacted the company they offered to replace it, I decided to keep it anyway because I had already uploaded everything on it. I just adjust the volume in the media screen.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars from me on my iPad2!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie L. Thayer
Reviews.Content: I love this iPad, it was easy to get it going, connected right away to wi-fi. The screen is big so my older eyes can see well, it's lighter then my freinds iPad 1, it synced up with iTunes well. Was nicer then described by seller and shipping was fast!

Reviews.Title: Great Ipad
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: This is a great Ipad in wonderful shape. This is my second one I have a 32gb I wanted one with more memory the 64gb this the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: L. McCombs
Reviews.Content: I was a holdout in getting an ipad, but now I can't live without it! I'm spending way too much time on it now! Kindle books are easy to get, games are awesome, and the quick access to Facebook and email is wonderful! Definitely a keeper!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jansu831
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about the iPad?  Worth the extra money to get this one with the camera on it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: bbo
Reviews.Content: I mainly use it to process credit cards for my business, skyping with family and friends, and learning games for the kids. I have downloaded a ton of games and it still has a lot of space left, and having the camera is great!

Reviews.Title: Love, love love it!!
Reviews.Author: Good
Reviews.Content: I really really like my Ipad.  It is so light and easy to take on trips.  And my grandkids are also hooked on it!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: shirley p. cox
Reviews.Content: The iPad lets me be mobile using it as my computer anywhere at home or when I travel, surfing the internet, taking photos with it, keeping up with email, skyping - anything I could do on my desktop computer I can do on my iPad. I can hook it to the tv to watch  movies, if I want. It is super light weight and easy to  carry around.

Reviews.Title: amazing for the price...
Reviews.Author: latisha
Reviews.Content: i just bought this ipad 2 on the may 19th  and i got on the 22nd i recieved it fast and i am very pleased with this it and it is a 32 gb and the price was 314.00 that was a great price and i got it just in time because i got the last one but i only paid 300.00 because of the money i had saved on my account and bought some cases and other items with the money on my account it said used but it only had 3 marks on it 1 on the screen and 2 on the back it was like new to me just for 3 marks thats nothing and coming from a andorid tablet to an ipad it feels amazing and i love it... once again i paid 300.00  but the price was 314.00 for a ipad 2 32gb used.  AMAZING AND WONDERFUL....

Reviews.Title: Used iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Nixon Peter
Reviews.Content: The item was shipped faster than I thought and is in good condition. It came with the charger and cable as described but with scratches on the back which were pretty intense. Though if it's in the iPad cover  it can't be noticed coz the screen is in perfect condition. All in all the item was and still is good!

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Patricia M Marshall
Reviews.Content: GOOD QUALITY, EXACTLY WHAT WAS ADVERTISED.  WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS ITEM TO FRIENDS.  I REALLY LIKE THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE PRODUCT AS WELL.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: forevablessed13
Reviews.Content: Heard of all the iPads that were made this was the best generation of them all, I even saw the drop test & the battery test on YouTube, over all this was a better purchase. And I'm still enjoying it till now!!!

Reviews.Title: IPad-2
Reviews.Author: Patrick M.
Reviews.Content: This was a Mother's Day gift for my wife.  I ordered it on Friday and it came on Saturday, just in time for Mother's Day.  Very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: enough said
Reviews.Author: Nefertiti
Reviews.Content: it came as expected brand new and was really nice. I still enjoy it and never got tired of using it.

Reviews.Title: The ipad is small and compact for taking it with you!
Reviews.Author: sheila scott
Reviews.Content: I find it easy to use and especially like emailing with it. I use it every day and love how organized it keeps me.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I also would like to consider a mini ipad.This product is great. Thinking also to get one as a gift but looking for another price value.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT iPAD 2
Reviews.Author: Beatrice
Reviews.Content: I bought this refurbished iPad 2 (32 GB, Wifi+AT&T; 3G for my husband's birthday because he won't leave mine alone. Mine is also a refurb but I I bought it at Apple online and spent about $700.00 for it compared to Rocket Jakes price of $399. A Genius at Apple told me he prefers refurbished products as any FACTORY quirks that existed are straightened out. The iPad was simple to set up. It was in original Apple packaging and works perfectly. The AT&T; Wi-fi was also easy to set up. AT&T; has lower data charges for iPads than Verizon but Verizon has a larger coverage area. Alas! Money is tight. I also got a Smart Magnetic Cover for Apple Ipad 2 cover at Amazon from CyprusTech for $7.74 compared to the $39 I spent for mine at Apple and it looks and acts exactly the same. I'm thrilled with this product so far but I set it up with my Apple ID and now I'm going to have to jump through some hoops to figure out how to get my husband his own Apple ID because iTunes is all set up on one computer with MY Apple ID ....h-h-m-m-m! Another tech challenge.

Reviews.Title: Omg I love it
Reviews.Author: Tia LaFlesh
Reviews.Content: We travel and have medical appointments all over two states and  this has allowed my to take my college class with me while staying in touch with my family while we r away

Reviews.Title: I love it..
Reviews.Author: Stan Kent
Reviews.Content: Best thing I could have bought for myself.  I use it for so much.  Speakers could be betters and louder.  Overall, I would recommend this to anyone who does not want to lug a laptop around everywhere.

Reviews.Title: unbelievable product
Reviews.Author: Fenderman27
Reviews.Content: apple has done it again. the ipad is an absolutely incredible learning tool and makes it easy to have a computer anywhere you go

Reviews.Title: First class seller
Reviews.Author: Thomas Tyrrell
Reviews.Content: We love the product, despite the switch in color and would use this vendor again. It was as described in the advertising (except for the color switch).

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Sherel Gayle
Reviews.Content: Very good works well price reasonable would surely recommend for anyone to purchase for yourself or your kids love it.

Reviews.Title: iPad is great
Reviews.Author: mustanggirl03
Reviews.Content: I would have never been able to afford a new iPad--this way I have a used one that looks like a new one at 1/3 of the price of a brand new one.  I am totally happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Serena
Reviews.Content: I noticed that I made a mistake on my previous feedback, and want to correct it. This seller has Super Fast shipping ! I really love my Ipad its just what i was looking for!

Reviews.Title: This is my second one
Reviews.Author: cheryl h.
Reviews.Content: I was so pleased with my first i-pad that I bought another one for my brother in Thailand.  I was also very pleased that it arrived in such a short time.

Reviews.Title: Great product for Mom
Reviews.Author: Mojo
Reviews.Content: Hopefully less tech support issues.  I have an ASUS tablet myself and I found the iPad 2 touch screen to be sub-par by comparison.  Was much easier to set-up thought.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Julie Riley "stella79"
Reviews.Content: The iPad is great I sent it to my husband in Afghanistan and he loves it.  I was glad to find one that was black and was a 32GB it was a great price and was delivered quickly and in packed well for protection.Thank you

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Knapp
Reviews.Content: Fast and dependable. Easy to use.  Only down side is its not compatible with many down loads for listing to music online or silver lite which I needed for a website I was trying to take a test on.

Reviews.Title: ipad 2 att 3g wifi
Reviews.Author: anacortez01
Reviews.Content: work really well - and great price for ipad - only needed lcd replaces and sim crad reader fixed . didnt cost to much to fix thank you uarizona

Reviews.Title: So sweet ( He really cared)
Reviews.Author: chelsie park
Reviews.Content: Product sent was better than described. He described it as in very good shape- I would say excellent (like new) It was in the original packaging. He threw a new cover also.I was very pleased!! Than he followed up! I felt like he was professional, and he cared.I hopefully will get to do business with them again:)Chelsie

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: FRED DAW
Reviews.Content: Is awesome, so good, my little dougther just love it. The battery is for just all day and is exactly what i wanted.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Joserlande
Reviews.Content: It works well and it's very fast, I'm actually glad I brought it and I am enjoying it, I receive it more quicker then I expected.

Reviews.Title: Great Tool!
Reviews.Author: okcmech11
Reviews.Content: This ipad is a great tool for our service technicians. This allows them to view larger print and more detail than the iphone screen.

Reviews.Title: apple ipad 2 just awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: MetalleriUM
Reviews.Content: at this time it could be old but still very good tablet, better than others that is suppose to be faster and cheaper but they are just laggy and plastic i know because i had many tablets in my hands and i dont really need widgets or the unused flash (html5 is today with us and is the future)..... Ipad2 still best tablet for a price today!!

Reviews.Title: For somebody else.
Reviews.Author: Vanesa
Reviews.Content: It was a last minute order and I was scared it would not arrive before my trip to Argentina but, in TWO DAYS it was at my door. Excellent service!

Reviews.Title: good product.
Reviews.Author: MaddyRo
Reviews.Content: Good product. Fast shipping. Very happy with sale. Bought it for my husband for our anniversary and he was very happy with the ipad

Reviews.Title: My Ipad
Reviews.Author: Mombo_Moe
Reviews.Content: I'm just loving it. I use it for photo clients and it is just great! I use it mostly in the field.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Karen Miles
Reviews.Content: It came in the original packaging in perfect condition. It works perfect and I'm so glad I purchased it. I 100% recommend to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet !
Reviews.Author: Do Huu Tuan
Reviews.Content: I have tried Android, Window, and iOS, and believe me, iOS is the best for tablet devices. Smooth and durable battery - even the used one is absolutely great to buy

Reviews.Title: boyfriend loves it
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: got this for the boyfriend so he could play "rerave" on it and he plays constantly. i wasn't sure if he'd like it at first but im very glad i got it. shipment came extremely fast and in perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Irene Thiry
Reviews.Content: works grate and i love being able to do thing when my bf is tacking a nap i can still check my mail and other thing all day  long

Reviews.Title: 2nd Gen iPad
Reviews.Author: Sandra Stacy
Reviews.Content: I'm still trying to figure it all out, but my grandson loves it!  He's only 9 and can do almost anything with it already.  Great babysitter and he's learning things too!  Couldn't ask for more....

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 all the way
Reviews.Author: vegeta
Reviews.Content: The iPad 2 is a good tool for those that don't have an iPad 3. I got it for my girlfriend and she has no complaints except for the middle button giving her issues. It only happened twice, but it stopped after a while. I recommend it for all.

Reviews.Title: Apple I pad
Reviews.Author: Jack Rexilius
Reviews.Content: This is a good product ..couldn't afford to get the latest version , but this works just fine for now .

Reviews.Title: It's an iPad.....What More Can You Say
Reviews.Author: Brittany F.
Reviews.Content: I brought this one to replace the one I let my grandma borrow that she won't give back.  It is the perfect tablet for the whole family. My 5 year old God-daughter can use it with ease, as well as my 69 year old grandmother. I love that Apple has restrictions under the settings that I can turn off everything, so my God-daughter won't purchase everything by simply clicking a button. I hardly use my laptop at all because this does everything my laptop can do.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: Kathie Moore
Reviews.Content: I'm new to the IPad but I'm finding it easier as I get accustomed it.  It takes time to figure out all the options,  I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Reliable tool
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: As usual, Apple gives you a tool that does not fail. My only concern is its operative system: you are led to spend money with Apple every two strokes. The customizable past of the Mac is not present in this device.

Reviews.Title: I Love this Gadget!
Reviews.Author: Richard Anderson "Rick Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I love this thing...use it constantly.  Wi-Fi works really well.  It keeps me from running into the next room to check for emails all the time.  It's small.  it's convenient and well worth the price.  I have not had any problems with my ipad..

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE IPAD !!!!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Dardon
Reviews.Content: Apple is the best ...bought the ipad for work does everything it was intended for ..great resolution fast response ..size a little annoying definitely will consider mini !! Better yet it paid for itself in its first week!!!!just by posting ads online ...dardin810@gmail.com ..email me and I can tell you how I paid for my ipad it's first week !!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my husband on a budget. I have an iPad already but he wanted one as well. It came in very fast and in wonderful condition! He thought it was brand new! I obviously did good! Lol. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: rdav
Reviews.Content: The touch screen worked reasonably well.  Needed to buy a screen guard to view the screen outdoors, but haven't had any other problems so far.  This was a refurbished unit, so there were some scratches on the case as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Still a powerful tool
Reviews.Author: Mark J
Reviews.Content: This was my choice for a first-time tablet user who has a similar one in her household. It meets her needs very well.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the iPad. I especially wanted it to create documents, transfer documents from my laptop, and to do my sermons and presentations on. It really has been great! My only criticism is that Apple doesn't have a warranty on it.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: sulekwi
Reviews.Content: What can I say. I enjoy my iPad so much that I ended up buying two more of them  it would be to your advantage to buy one with more memory if you are a photo enthusiast like myself .

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 review
Reviews.Author: John N. Churchill
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my new iPad 2.  It'll take a while to explore all of the possibilities.  But it is already a useful thing to have.

Reviews.Title: Better than described!
Reviews.Author: Tera Williams
Reviews.Content: The iPad was in even better condition than described. It works perfectly and looks great. I'm using It to write this review :)

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Wolf
Reviews.Content: Bought these for my wife's Ipad. She loves it. They make it easy to clean spills and wipe things off of it.

Reviews.Title: This tablet was a gift for my daughter.
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: She absolutely loves it, She she says is easy to use and she use it 24/7. The price was right too

Reviews.Title: apple ipad
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Nicholson
Reviews.Content: Love it so much fun use it everyday. Would recomend to all.It is easy to use and you get a lot of free aps

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my daughter and she carries it everywhere
Reviews.Author: Charles Wright
Reviews.Content: Not an Apple fan, but my daughter is. She uses her iPad more than her laptop now. She wouldn't know what to do without it.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Jyri Ketola
Reviews.Content: It was a good find, reasonable price and excellent condition. It has been very usefull and filled all my expectations. Only problem is, that there are so many features which you don't use so often and then you forgot how to use them. That's ofcourse more like a personal problem..

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: Andy Mack "Garageman"
Reviews.Content: The price was right, the iPad perfect.  A "complaint"?  Yes.  I don't apprecitate the little ad's that show up!  And why no user's guide?  If it weren't for some friends with an iPad2 for help, I don't know what I would be doing right now.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: B. Murray "B. J. Murray"
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase.  It was like brand new and the warranty was still on it.  Excellent service as well.

Reviews.Title: ipad
Reviews.Author: Desiree Kuhnle
Reviews.Content: We got our grand son an ipad of his own for his last birthday (6).  He had played with mine every time he came over so it was an easy gift to give.  He knows how to maneuver around.  I did get a more sturdy case for it recently.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Greg Bushman
Reviews.Content: Wife loves this, she uses it all the time.  Great investment.  everyone should own one, I might even buy another

Reviews.Title: More of a play toy :\
Reviews.Author: karis jones "K.Jones"
Reviews.Content: The Ipad2 is generally well responsive and quick however there are a few malfuctions/weak points where it could of been made better. I test out tablets/ e-readers because I need them for school/coursework however The Apple Ipad has poor buisness apps and tools. The notes apps are very basic and less focused on. Apple mainly foucuses on its apps and games which attract the younger population. For example it has more Angry Birds Apps then your fingers on your hand! Some strong points are the Facebook app, Facetime(Similar to Skype) and Itunes. Not my taste of tablet and I will be selling it soon.

Reviews.Title: Great iPad
Reviews.Author: cody white "cj"
Reviews.Content: i got this ipad for my birthday and i love it it is amazing it does just about everthing i want but it does not come with a user guide you have to download that yourself otherwise i reccomend it !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: hector
Reviews.Content: Im Was worry abut buy somthing like this because You dont know what You getting on Mail but. Its an a greate experience

Reviews.Title: The best ever
Reviews.Author: Ryo12382
Reviews.Content: This is so far the best computer, PC, tablet, and digital device that my family has ever used. There's no words that can describe how good and powerful this iPad is. It's just out of this world!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: David Schirato
Reviews.Content: How can you beat this-spend your money and get this one of the best- month or two later you won't remember how much you spent- tight wad- but you might not be able to do all with lessor devices

Reviews.Title: Very happy with product!
Reviews.Author: Jean-Marc
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skepitical on buying a refurbished ipad, but I am glad I did!  It is just like new and was as if I was purchasing it brand new!

Reviews.Title: The iPad is perfect. The superficial part is not up to par.
Reviews.Author: Francesca
Reviews.Content: The iPad s the best thing ever invented and I love everything about it. I bought it used to save money but just wish I was told that it had been dropped and had a lot of scratches on it. I found the dint on the bottom side and just hope that does not affect the iPad, so far so good. I also wish that I was told about all the scratches on the back, this is ok because I bought a case to cover it but I think when you spend a lot of money on something even if its used that the buyer should be notified of all the flaws before hand. I thought I would be able to  download Microsoft Office and I can not so I had to download a app and pay $10 so I can do my school work on it which is the main purpose I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: akatex
Reviews.Content: Works great and saved a few bucks.  I really am glad I got my IPad. It does so much more than what I had imagined.

Reviews.Title: best ipad2 that i every got,
Reviews.Author: joseph velazquez
Reviews.Content: i don't have to use my laptop and it not going to burn out as fast. its great for game, messages, mail, moves and so much more.battery life is good,

Reviews.Title: Hello!!
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Hello,  My  grandson  likes  the I pad,  it's  working  pretty  well. Thanks  guys, Excellent  job.  Thanks  again. respectfully  from  Georgia.

Reviews.Title: Great piece of technology
Reviews.Author: Fogger_man
Reviews.Content: I love my ipad 2! It works perfectly and was a great value. What can I say? It's an ipad!

Reviews.Title: wife pleaser
Reviews.Author: Garold Jette
Reviews.Content: I got the tablet for my wife on her birthday to replace her laptop. She love it and now I have a hard time getting her attention away from it.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: David Cozad
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product not only does it work as advertised, the price was great. The 32 gb is great

Reviews.Title: No Apple Care for this purchase
Reviews.Author: Helen Siegel
Reviews.Content: I loved the iPad but when I approached apple with the purchase receipt and asked to add Apple care they said because the seller was considered the original owner I was declined. So I returned it and bought an I pad from Apple directly.

Reviews.Title: A little upset
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Making this super short, bought refurbished and a part of the screen doesnt compleately work all the time, its like a line going down the screen that is unresponsive to an extent.

Reviews.Title: My best electronic purchase.
Reviews.Author: Just me
Reviews.Content: I was given an older version IPAD from my brother last year and really liked it but it only worked on Wi-Fi. I don't live in an area where Wi-Fi is always available so I was limited to using it at home. so a few months later when my 50th birthday was coming up, my husband asked what I would like. I told him the only thing I wanted was the IPad with wireless AND 3G. Of course he thought I was nuts since I had a perfectly good, working IPAd already. So naturally, I got my wish!  We ordered a refurbished one to save money. I have not been disappointed yet! I take it everywhere with me. I am impressed with the speed even when using 3G. I am able to use it at our cabin and streamed our High School basketball State Championship game with zero problems.  The only problem I have now is I own a 5 month old Laptop that I rarely use!

Reviews.Title: What to say that hasn't been said
Reviews.Author: Jahmez "I'm a nerd who wants to help"
Reviews.Content: Chances are, you know what an iPad is and know the positives of it. It is very user friendly, it has tons of apps, and they are all ran through Apple so they work very well. There are occasional crashes with streaming app, but it only closes the app and you can reopen it. This is the iPad 2, so, if you are expecting Siri... you will be disappointed. Siri is nice, but it isn't needed to love this product. The maps is still awful, but you can get Google maps and that is much better. Realistically, this is wonderful for people who do a lot of internet based surfing and want a phone experience but bigger. It is also great for family that is horrible with tech. If you are wondering, "Well, I'm a power user, is there anything for me?" Firstly, you should know how to look that up yourself. Secondly, yes! You can VPN into a laptop or desktop with many apps available in the app store to Virtualize your desktop from any wifi access point. Great buy and if money is a problem, the iPad 2 is now cheap enough to not be a big purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Envy
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product for everyone. The controls are simple enough for even my parents to understand (lol, I love them, but they're a little slow on the technological uptake), but the functions it provides and the apps that can be added are able to provide complex operations tailored to suit any need.The battery life is amazing. I can use it almost continuously for approximately twenty hours before I need to reuse it. Less if I'm using heavy graphics, etc. But even then it functions for around sixteen hours. It charges very quickly when turned off and plugged into the wall. The screen is very responsive, and the keyboard is not as difficult to use as I had feared (this is referring to the larger keyboard that appears when you turn the device side-ways. The smaller keyboard is more difficult, but not impossible). The only downside I see to the keyboard is that I can't select Spanish letters and accents. I hear that there may be a way to get them, but I haven't had success thus far.All in all, a wonderful device. I love it, and would buy it again.

I recommend this, but if you want the 3rd generation don't buy this and save your money. If you don't want the 3rd generation, go ahead. Reviews.Title: I Apple
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Tyler "thx. M"
Reviews.Content: Why? Compare two things and you will know. Time and Living. If these two matter to you, then look at how convenient it is to use an Apple based appliance. Some say intuitive. I say easy. Basic. Bottom line - resourceful all the time. Time is what you save with Apple iPad 2, second generation. The core of Apple is it's safety, not programs that take up your memory and time, costly in cash and down town, called security programs. You know what I am talking about. Security for the designers and owners, but un-necessary with Apple.Easy to take-along with its weight-less characteristic, yet durable on the road in performance. Best buy for the iPad buck so far.iT InterestedMichael T

Reviews.Content: Love it!  Use it everyday.  Very impressed with the item.  yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

Reviews.Title: Great device, lives up to the hype
Reviews.Author: dobrin
Reviews.Content: I've had my iPad, which I bought used, since the end of April 2012.  I bought it to read articles (both academic PDF's and online fare via Instapaper) and play silly games, and it has exceeded my expectations on both counts.  I had used both a 7" and 10" Android tablet (modded Nook Color and gTablet, respectively) and a 4th generation iPod Touch in the past for pretty much the same purposes as with the iPad, and found myself not turning them on and subsequently selling them, so I was skeptical of how useful I'd find the iPad vs. a laptop or desktop.The advantage over the iPod Touch is just a matter of real estate.  The interfaces of the universal apps that I've used (ones that are available on both the iPod Touch and iPad) are much better on the iPad.  Not to knock Android, because I was admittedly using heavily modded versions of it and didn't have access to the entire Market (now Google Play, I guess), but there really are a ton of good apps available on the App Store.  There are good, efficient implementations of board games, silly puzzle games, a perfectly fine browser experience, good Dropbox, Instapaper, and Evernote apps; I could go on, but, really, there are just a ton of ways to use the iPad well.  I don't use it for much productivity (outside of Evernote and Dropbox), so I couldn't speak to that aspect.  But as a fun device that's useful to me, it's easy to recommend it to others.  If you want to spend the extra $100 for retina display, sure, go ahead and get the third generation one.  If you're struggling between the iPad 2 and other companies' tablets, though, I say go with the Apple.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Nancy N. Gray "Lillie Bo"
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the iPad. It was easy to set up and add apps. It is all I had hoped it would be.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: KrystalC
Reviews.Content: I recently made the decision to purchase an iPad. While deciding which to buy, I concluded that newer models (generations) are being made all the time and it is too hard to keep up. I ultimately chose the iPad 2 based on price.Pros:I was very impressed with how quickly my item arrived. I ordered it on a Thursday and was told I could expect it the following Wednesday-Friday. I received it the next Monday (4 days after ordering, including the weekend). In fact, i received the ipad prior to receiving the case. The packaging was great and there weren't any tears or major dents to the original box. The iPad was secure and protected.Cons: Some of the apps are not formatted for the larger screen of the iPad. For example, Instagram remains the size of a cell phone screen. There is an option to magnify the screen in the lower left hand corner, however the display becomes pixilated.Overall: I'm familiar with Apple products and am pleased with the product. It is easy to navigate and use. I am very pleased with my purchase.

I like that I can have a Kindle app, a Kobo app, and a Nook app all in one place without having to have several different e-readers. I like to get certain books on certain apps, especially if the price for a book is more affordable than another. Having an iPad just makes things a little more convenient. I love it.

Great for Movies/games apps  for the little ones2. Fb3. Exercise videos when on the runNegatives:After downloading 2 Disney Movies and one exercise video I am being told I don't have enough storage on iCloud.  Of course, I am sure I Cloud is willing to sell me additional space.  LOL

Reviews.Title: Would give it more stars if I could
Reviews.Author: Tanya Buys "Teacher"
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad. It is so easy to use and so useful. I bought the one without the cellular data ability. I didn't want to have to pay for a data plan and saved money on the cost of the iPad. That was the right choice for me. I use it all over the place with free wi fi spots so widely available. There are so many apps available that you can customize it for your needs very easily. This almost replaces my laptop computer. I hardly ever turn on the laptop anymore. The iPad runs faster than my laptop on most things online. I bought my iPad after falling in love with the one that I was issued for use in my special education class. I have been totally amazed at the things that I have seen happening in my classroom with the iPad. Any teacher, homeschoolers, or parent should have at least one iPad strictly for the kids. They are great learning tools with so many educational apps available--most free or low cost. And if you have a special needs child or student, then you doubly need an iPad for their use. It is much easier to use than a conventional computer for special needs children. And if you have a child with any disability on the Autism spectrum than you absolutely, without a doubt MUST have an iPad for your child. There are hundreds of apps designed just for people with Autism. If for no other reason than to use as an augmented communication system device, you must get this for your child with Autism.If I am asked to name one flaw with the iPad, it is that it cannot be cleaned. The screen gets lots of finger prints and gunk on it--especially with children using it. And it will get scratches on the screen, no matter how careful you are. If using it in a classroom with lots of children it can be a germ breeding ground since you cannot wipe it down with disinfectant. At school, we stick them inside gallon zip close storage bags as a good protective covering that can be thrown out and replaced cheaply. Screen protectors are a must have accessory.

I will definitely buy from her again confident I'll get the same super fast deliver and quick response.
